aya.footnotes: [1] Yarabaremye mu ntanga, hanyuma Iziremamwo amaraso avuze; hanyuma Iyaremamwo igihimba c’inyama, hanyuma Ikiremamwo amagufa; hanyuma Iraheza Yambika nya magufa inyama.

aya.translation: Mbega, ntimubona ukuntu Imana Allah Yaremye amajuru indwi agerekeranye!
Iraheza Igira ukwezi kubaboneshereza mw’ijuru ribegereye, Igira n’izuba ngo ribabere itara ryakiriza bose rikabasusurutsa!
Burya Imana Allah, Yaremye inkomoko yanyu mw’ivu[2]; nka kurya Imeza imbuto mw’isi;
aya.footnotes: [2] Imana Allah Yaremye so wanyu Adamu mw’ivu, Iraheza Itegekanya ibikenewe mu mfungurwa mw’ivu, kugira ngo ashobore kubandanya kuba kw’isi.

aya.translation: Hanyuma, Imana Allah Izobasubiza mw’ivu mupfuye, Iheze Inaribazuremwo kandi ku musi w’impera.
Imana Allah, ni Yo Yabagiriye isi nk’isaso;
Kugira ngo mugendagende mwidegemvye kuri yo”.

Intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), yavuze iti: “Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Mu vy’ukuri, abantu banje barimonogoje mu kungarariza, baraheza bakurikira abantu ata co amatungo yabo n’abana babo bizobungura, atari uguhuba kw’isi no guhomba mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
Abarongoye abandi, baragize n’ubwononyi bukomeye mu guhubisha ababumvira;

Baraheza bavuga babwira ba nyarucari bati: “Ntimurote muvavanura no gusenga imana zanyu ngo musenge Imana ya Nuhu; ntimureke gusenga “Waddu”, canke “Suwaa’u”, canke “Yaghuuthi”, canke “Ya’uuqa” na “Nasri”[3]”.
aya.footnotes: [3] Ayo, ni amazina y’abantu beranda, bigeze kubaho hanyuma barapfa, maze shetani iraheza yosha abantu babo ko bobagirira ivyibutso bazokwama babibukirako, gutyo bagamburukire Imana Allah kurusha. Abashinze ivyo vyibutso, bamaze guhwera, hagaca igihe kirekire, shetani yashotse yosha abuzukuruza babo ko bosenga nya vyibutso, bakanavyifashisha mu gusaba. Ni na co gituma rero, kizira kikaziririzwa kugira ibishusho n'ivyibutso, kwubakira iburi ku mva, kuko inyuma y’igihe kirekire birashobora gusengwa mu gishingo c’Imana Allah.

aya.translation: Mu vy’ukuri abarongoye abandi, baramaze guhubisha ba nyarucari benshi. Kubera ivyo rero Mana! Ndagusavye ntiwongerereze abirenganije mu kukugarariza, kiretse ubuhuvyi n’agahombo ku kandi".
Kubera ibicumuro vyabo vy’agahomerabunwa rero, basomeshejwe nturi biturutse kw’isegenya. Bazokwinjizwa no mu muriro udahera. Ntibazoshobora kuronka ababatabara mu bihano, kiretse Imana Allah.
Intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), imaze kwihebura ko batacemeye, yavuze iti: “Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Ntusige n’igisanira muri abo bagarariji, kigendagenda kw’isi;
Mu vy’ukuri, niwabasigaza kuri iyi si, bazohubisha ibiremwa vyawe, kandi ntibazokwibaruka atari abantu b’abanyavyaha, b’abagarariji;

Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Ngirira imbabazi jewe n’abavyeyi banje, n’uwo wese yinjiye mu nzu yanje yemera Imana Allah. Wongere ubabarire abemeramana n’abemeramanakazi, kandi ntiwongerereze abirenganije mu kugarariza, kiretse ukubahonya kw'isi, hamwe n’agahombo mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa”.

Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga ubwire abantu bawe uti: “Jewe, narahishuriwe ko umugwi w’Amajini wumvirije Qor’ani ndiko ndayisoma, uca ubwira benewabo uti: “Mu vy’ukuri twebwe Amajini, twumvise Qor’ani y’igitangaza;
Irongora mu nzira igororotse, duca turayemera ko ari amajambo y’Imana Allah. Ntituzokwigera tubangikanya Imana yacu Rurema Allah n’ikintu na kimwe.
Twemera n’uko Imana yacu Rurema Allah Nyaguhabwa icubahiro n’iteka biyikwiye, Itigeze Igira umugore canke umwana;
N’uko uwakehewe n’ubwenge muri twebwe ari we Ibilisi, yahora arementaniriza Imana Allah mu kuyomekera umugore n’umwana;
Mu vy’ukuri, twahora twiyumvira ko abantu hamwe n’Amajini, batazorementaniriza Imana Allah mu kuyomekera umugore n’umwana;
Twiyumvira n’uko, hariho abagabo mu biremwa-muntu, bahora bikingira ku bagabo mu Majini ngo babakingire ibibi mu rugendo[1], gutyo Amajini yongerereza abantu ubwoba bwo kuyatinya;
aya.footnotes: [1] Ukwo kwikingira ibibi ku biremwa, ari na kwo Imana Allah Yihanije ababangikanyamana, ni ibangikanyamana rikuru. Ntiribabarirwa n’Imana Allah, kiretse mu gihe uwarigize yigaye nya kwigaya ku Mana Allah. Iyi Aayah rero hamwe n’ivyo, irihaniza cane kuja ku bapfumu, ba rumenyi na ba senyagara, n’abandi.

aya.translation: N’uko abagarariji mu bantu, biyumvira nk’uko mwebwe Amajini mwiyumvira, ko Imana Allah Itazozura n’umwe mu biremwa.
Mu vy’ukuri, twaratumbereye amaja kw’ijuru gusuma urusaku, dusanga ryuzuye abamalayika bakomeye cane baricungereye n’ibishirira vy’inyenyeri nyakotsi.
Mu vy’ukuri, twahora twicara ku mfuruka zaryo, mu vyicaro vyo gusuma urusaku. Kuva ubu, uwo wese rero ahirahiye ngo asume urusaku amaja kw’ijuru, asanga arindiriwe n’igishirira nyakotsi giturira[2].
aya.footnotes: [2] Muri iyi Aayah ya 9 n’iya 10, harimwo icemezo c’uko abapfumu, abarozi, ba rumenyi na ba senyagara, batazi namba ibinyegejwe ibiremwa.

aya.translation: Mu vy’ukuri, ntituzi rero ko gucungera ijuru bidasanzwe, ari ku nabi y’abari kw’isi, canke ko Imana yabo Rurema Allah Ibashakira ineza n’ubugororotsi!
Mu vy’ukuri, burya muri twebwe Amajini, harimwo abagororotsi bikwiye, harimwo kandi abagarariji n’ibigaba. Turi imigwi itandukanye mu kwemera.
Mu vy’ukuri, twari tuzi ko tutazonanira Imana Allah, aho tuzoba turi hose, haba kw’isi canke mu kirere, kandi ko ata buhungiro.

Mu vy’ukuri, igihe twumva Qor’ani, twaciye tuyemera ata guhigimanga ko ari ukuri kuvuye ku Mana Allah. Kubera ivyo rero, uwo wese yemera Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, ntatinya kurenganywa mu kugabanywa ku ndishi canke kurengerezwa ku vyaha.
Muri twebwe rero, harimwo abislamu b’ukuri, hakabamwo n’abirenganya mu kurenga ku mabwirizwa y’Imana Allah. Abazokwicisha bugufi rero bakaba abislamu; abo, ni bo bazoba batumbereye inzira y’ukuri.
Nayo abirenganije mu kurenga ku mabwirizwa y’Imana Allah; abo, ni bo bazoba inkwi z’umuriro udahera Jahannamu”.

Iyo abagarariji mu bantu no mu Majini barongoka mu nzira y’ukwemera Imana Allah, bakaba abislamu, Twebwe Allah, Twari kubaronsa amazi menshi cane bakoroherwa mu kuronka ibibabeshaho mu buzima bwo kw’isi;

Kugira ngo Tubagerageze ko bashima inema bahawe n’Imana Allah. Uwo wese rero azokwirengagiza kwumviriza no kugendera urwibutso rw’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah rwa Qor’ani, Imana Allah Izomushira mu bihano bikomeye.
Mu vy’ukuri imisigiti yose, ni iy’Imana Allah, yagenewe ko Isengerwamwo. Kubera ivyo rero, ntimuze muyisengeremwo ikindi kintu hamwe n’Imana Allah, gutyo muheze musabe, musenge ku bw’Imana Allah[3].
aya.footnotes: [3] Iyi Aayah, ibwiriza kwubahiriza imisigiti mu kutayikoreramwo ikintu ico ari co cose cotosekaza izirikanamana, ikanahimiriza no gukurikira Intumwa yayo Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

aya.translation: Narahishuriwe n’uko igihe Umuja w’Imana Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) yariko arasengera ahitwa Batwnu Nakhla, Amajini yahatswe kwuriranako bitewe n’umugundano wo guhurumbira kwumviriza Qor’ani.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga ubwire abagarariji uti: “Jewe, nsenga gusa Imana yanje Rurema Allah Yonyene, kandi sindayibangikanya n’ikindi kintu mu kuyisenga”.
Babwire uti: “Jewe mu vy’ukuri, nta bushobozi mfise bwo kubakingira ikibi canke bwo kubaronsa iciza”.
Babwire uti: “Jewe mu vy’ukuri, nta n’umwe ashoboye kunkingira ibihano vy’Imana Allah mu gihe noyigarariza; kandi muri ico gihe, nta buhungiro noronka atari ku Mana Allah;

Nta na kimwe njejwe, kiretse gushikiriza ubutumwa, Imana Allah Yandungikanye. Uwo wese rero azogarariza Imana Allah hamwe n’Intumwa yayo, nta nkeka ko indishi yiwe ari umuriro udahera Jahannamu, azowubamwo ibihe bidahera, mu bihano vyamaho”.
Kugeza aho ababangikanyamana bazobonera ibihano basezeraniwe, aho ni ho rero bazoheza bagatahura uwufise abatabazi bagoyagoya, kandi bari ku rushi.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Bwira ababangikanyamana uti: “Sinzi ko ivyo bihano mwasezeraniwe biri hafi gushika, canke ko Imana yanje Rurema Allah Izobiha ikiringo kirekire, bitarashika”.
Imana Allah, ni Yo Izi ibinyegejwe ibiremwa, kandi ntiyereka uwo ari we wese ivyo binyegezwa vyayo;

Kiretse uwo Yishimiye Ikamugira Intumwa. Uyo muri ico gihe rero, Imana Allah Iraheza Ikamwereka mu binyegezwa vyayo, Ikanamurungikira abamalayika bamucungereye imbere n’inyuma yiwe, ku kuzitira abasumyi b’urusaku mu Majini[4];
aya.footnotes: [4] Kugira ntihagire n’umwe mu Majini ashobora gusuma urusaku mu kumenya ibinyegezwa vyayo.

aya.translation: Kugira ngo Intumwa (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), imenye ko n'Intumwa z’aho hambere yayo, zakingiwe nkayo mu gihe co gushikiriza ubutumwa, n’uko ikingiwe Amajini nk’uko zakingiwe; yongere imenye n’uko ubumenyi bw’Imana Allah, bukikuje ukuntu izo Ntumwa zimerewe hamwe n’amabwirizwa zikeneye kwisunga; imenye kandi n’uko Imana Allah Izi bikwiye igitigiri c’ibintu vyose.
Ewe wizingiriye mu mpuzu!
Haguruka usenge mw’ijoro, usigaze umwanya muto wo kuruhuka;
Senga igice c’ijoro canke ugabanyeko gato gushika ku ca gatatu caryo;
Canke wongereko gato gushika ku vya gatatu bibiri, hanyuma usome neza Qor’ani ntagatifu mu bwitonzi, wubahirije amategeko y’ukuntu isomwa.
Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Tuzokumanurira Qor’ani irimwo amabwirizwa ahambaye.

Mu vy’ukuri, ukwiyegereza Imana Allah mu gusenga mw’ijoro, kuratururuza umushaha kurusha, kandi kuratuma utahura neza igisomwa, kuko umuntu muri uwo mwanya, nta buremere n’umwitwarariko w’ivy’isi biba bimuhanze.

Ntumwa y’Imana! Mu vy’ukuri ku murango, urafise umwanya munini ukwiye wo gutunganya ivyawe n’ibindi bikorwa vy'ishikirizabutumwa. Kubera ivyo rero, koresha umwanya wo mw’ijoro mu gusenga Imana yawe Allah;
Wongere uninahaze Izina ry’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, kandi wamizeko kuyisenga bimwe bivuye ku mutima, unayizere.

Imana Allah, ni Yo Mubungabunzi Rugaba w’ubuseruko n’uburengero n’ibiri hagati y’aho, nta mana rero ibwirijwe gusengwa atari Yo Yonyene gusa. Kubera ivyo rero, yizere uheze uyigire Umuhagarikizi wawe muri vyose.
Uheze wihanganire n’ivyo ababangikanyamana bakuvugako, mu kugutyoza wewe hamwe n’idini warungikanwe, maze witandukanye n’ivyo bakora unabirengagize ata gahigihigi.
Maze undekere Jewe Allah abahakana Aayah zanje, borohewe mu buzima bwo kw’isi; batenyenyere gato, maze ubandekere vuba bwango bazokwibonerako.
Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Turafise ibihano Twabateguriye mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa; ibihano vyo kuboheshwa iminyororo iremereye no guturirwa mu muriro ururumba ata guhesha;
N’imfungurwa zihagama uwuziriye, n’ibindi bihano vy’akataraboneka bibabaza cane bibarindiriye;
Umusi isi hamwe n’imisozi bizogigima, maze imisozi ikaba nk’amaburi y’umusenyi woroshe yayotse.

Bantu b'i Makka! Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twarabarungikiye Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), kugira itubere icabona ku bugarariji n’ubugaba bwanyu, nk’uko Twarungikiye Firawuni Intumwa Musa (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah);
Ni uko rero, Firawuni yarahakanye iyo Ntumwa, ntiyaheza ngo ayemere, Dushoka Tumuhanisha ibihano vy’akarorero[1].
aya.footnotes: [1] Iyi Aayah, iragabisha uwo wese aca kubiri n’Intumwa akagabitanya, ko ashobora gushikirwa n’ibihano nk’ivyashikiye Firawuni n’abantu biwe.

aya.translation: Mbega none, ni gute mwokwikingira - mu gihe mwobandanya kugarariza - ibihano vy’umusi w’izuka, umusi uzosazisha abana bakamera imvi kubera intureka zawo!
Kuri uwo musi, ijuru rizokwata imigaga. Ni isango ry’Imana Allah ritegerezwa gushika nta gisivya.
Mu vy’ukuri, izi Aayah za Qor’ani zigabisha, zirimwo urwibutso ku bantu. Uwushaka kwibuka rero, niyumvire Imana Allah, maze afate inzira igana ku Mana yiwe Rurema Allah.

Muvugishwamana! Mu vy’ukuri Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Irazi ko wewe hari igihe uhaguruka mw’ijoro gusenga umwanya wababa ivya gatatu bibiri vyaryo, ikindi gihe ugasenga igice caryo canke ica gatatu caryo; kandi aho hose uba uri kumwe na bamwe mu ngendanyi zawe. Burya Imana Allah, ni Yo Itunganya ibiringo vy’ijoro n’umurango. Imana Allah rero, Irazi ko mutazoshobora kwubahiriza ibiringo vyo gusenga ijoro ryose, kubera ivyo rero, Iraborohereje. Muraheza rero musome mw’isengesho ryo mw’ijoro, ibisomwa vyoroshe muri Qor’ani. Imana Allah, Irazi ko muri mwebwe hazobamwo abarwaye, abafata ingendo baja kurondera icorirenza mu mpano z’Imana Allah, n’abandi rero baja guharanira idini ryayo. Kubera ivyo rero, murasoma mw'isengesho ryo mu gicugu, ibisomwa biboroheye muri Qor'ani, muheze mutsimbataze n'amasengesho-bwirizwa, mwongere mutange n'ishikanwa-bwirizwa, hanyuma mugurane Imana Allah, ingurane nziza mu gutanga imperezwa ku bwayo. Nta na kimwe rero mutanga ku neza yanyu, kiretse ko muzosanga indishi yaco ku Mana Allah, muzosanga ari ineza n’indishi nyinshi kuruta ivyo mwatanze kw’isi. Nimusabe kandi imbabazi ku Mana Allah mu bihe vyose. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, ni Yo Nyenimbabazi-ntangere ku bigaya, Nyenimbabazi ku batoni bayo.
Ewe wipfutse impuzu!
Haguruka ugabishe abantu ku bihano vy’Imana Allah;
Ninahaza wongere ukuze n’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, mu kuyiyegereza mu vyo ukora vyose;
Sukura n’impuzu zawe ibihumanya kuko isuku ry’ibiboneka riranga isuku ry’umushaha n’ibitaboneka;
Bandanya witandukanye n’ibigirwamana vyose ntukavyegere;
Kandi ntugatange uzeye gusubirizwa mu ndumane umurengera;
Kubera ugushimwa n’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, niwihanganire ishira mu ngiro ry’amabwirizwa yayo.
Nihavuzwa inzamba ya kabiri yo kuzuka;
Uwo musi, ni wo uzoba uremereye cane ku bagarariji;
Ntuzoborohera na gato kubera ibibazo vy’iharurirwa.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Ndekera Jewe Allah, uwo Naremye mu nda ya nyina ari wenyene, ata matungo ata n’abana yavukanye;
Ndaheza Ndamuha amatungo menshi amaze kuvuka;
N’abana bama hambavu yiwe i Makka;
Ndamworohereza no mu buzima bw’isi, Ndamuhesha n’icubahiro;
Hanyuma akipfuza ko Nomwongerereza ku vyo afise, kandi yarangararije!
Eka, nateshwe ate, arahumba! Mu vy’ukuri, ni umuntu yama yarwanije Aayah n’ivyemezo vyacu;
Nzomuha ibihano bikomakomeye cane ata gahengwe[1].
aya.footnotes: [1] Uwuvugwa muri izi Aayah, ni umuhakanyi ruhebwa w’i Makka, yitwa Al-Waliid mwene Al-Mughiira. Ibihano yasezeraniwe ng’aho, bitegekanirijwe uwo wese ahakana akarwanya ukuri yivuye inyuma.

aya.translation: Mu vy’ukuri, yaricaye ariyumvira ico yotegekanya, kugira atyoze Qor’ani n’Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).
Nyakuvumwa n’Imana Allah! Ukuntu yategekanije iryo tyoza!
Hanyuma, nyakuvumwa n’Imana Allah! Ukuntu yategekanije iryo tyoza!
Hanyuma arihweza ico yovuga mu gutyoza Qor’ani n’Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah);
Araheza arijirirwa mu maso, aranyinyirwa kuko atorohewe kuronka ico yovuga.
Hanyuma arirengagiza ukuri n’amanyama menshi ku bwishime;
Aca avuga atyoza Qor’ani ati: “Iyi Qor’ani si ikindi, kiretse ko ari uburozi, Muhamadi yarazwe n’ab’aho hambere;
Mu vy’ukuri Qor’ani si ikindi, kiretse ko ari amajambo yabuye ku bantu b’abakurambere, araheza ayitirira Imana”.
Jewe Allah, Nzomuta mu muriro ubabura.
Mbega ni igiki cokumenyesha uwo muriro ubabura ico ari co?
Nta co usigaza utakirigise, nta n’ico urekura ngo gicaruke;
Ubabura urukoba rw’umubiri mu kanya isase;
Ucungerewe n’abamalayika b’ibihangange cumi n’icenda, bakaba ari na bo bajejwe guhana.

Twebwe Allah, ntitwashizeho abacungera uwo muriro, atari abamalayika b’ibihangange. Ntitwanagize ico gitigiri cabo, atari ukugira ngo kibe ikigeragezo ku bagarariji; kugira n’abahawe Igitabu bamenye ko Qor’ani ari ukuri; no kugira ngo ukwemera kw’abemera Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo, kwiyongere; no kugira ngo abahawe Igitabu n’abemeramana ntibasubire gukekeranya mw’idini ku vyerekeye igitigiri c’abamalayika bacungereye Jahannamu[2]; no kugira ngo abafise indwara y’uburyarya mu mitima yabo n’abagarariji, bavuge batangara bati: “Mbega, Imana Allah Yashatse kuvuga iki mu gutanga aka karorero k’igitigiri c’abamalayika bacungereye umuriro!”. Ni nk’ukwo nyene rero Imana Allah, Ihubisha uwo Ishatse kuko yahisemwo uguhakana, Ikarongora mu nzira yayo uwo Ishatse, kuko yahisemwo ukwemera. Nta n’umwe rero azi igitigiri c’ingabo z’Imana yawe Rurema Allah uko kingana, atari Yo Yonyene ubwayo, kanatsinda uwo muriro wa Jahannamu si ikindi, kiretse ko ari urwibutso ku bantu.
aya.footnotes: [2] Kuko ico gitigiri nyene, ni co kivugwa no mu bindi Bitabu vyamanuwe.

aya.translation: Eka nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Si uko bahakanye Intumwa na Qor’ani! Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku kwezi!
No kw’ijoro iyo bwije hakijima!
No ku gitondo iyo hakeye bugatamanzura!
Ko mu vy’ukuri uwo muriro wa Jahannamu, ari kimwe mu ntureka zihambaye!
Kugira ngo habe igabishwa ry’abantu ku bihano vy’Imana Allah;
Ku wo ari we wese muri mwebwe ashaka gutera intambwe mu kwemera, canke ashaka gutera asubira inyuma mu buhakanyi.
Umuntu wese rero azogirwa ingwati ku vyo yakoze, ntazobohorwa kiretse mu gihe yoba yakoze ibitunganye canke ahanwe;
Havuyemwo gusa abantu b’iburyo, bazohabwa ibitabu vy’ibikorwa vyabo mu minwe yabo y’iburyo.
Abo rero, ni bo bazoba bari mu mirima itotahaye yo mu Bwami bw’ijuru, babazanya;
Ukuntu abanyavyaha bamerewe.
Bazobabaza bati: “Mbega, ni igiki catumye mwinjira mu muriro ubabura wama wegenyejwe?”.
Na bo bazobishura bati: “Tukiri kw’isi, ntitwari mu basenga amasengesho-bwirizwa;
Ntitwigeze tunafungurira abakene;
Twahora dukora n’ivyaha hamwe n’abanyavyaha;
Twahora tunahakana ko ata n’umusi w’impera uriho;
Kugeza n’aho dushikiriwe n’urupfu, tukiri nk’uko turi”.
Kuri uwo musi rero, ivugira ry’abavugira abandi[3] nta co rizobamarira namba.
aya.footnotes: [3] Mu bamalayika, Intumwa n’abandi.

aya.translation: Mbega bafashwe n’iki, ko birengagiza kwibutswa n’iyo Qor’ani!
Wogira ngo ni imparage zivudutse zitekewe n’ubwoba;
Zihunze intambwe.
Ahubwo umwe wese muri bo, agomba ko yohabwa Igitabu ciwe bwite, cemeza ko wewe uri Intumwa y’Imana.
Eka nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Si nk’uko bibaza namba, ahubwo ntibatinya ibihano vyo mu buzima bw'inyuma yo gupfa n’iharurirwa, ngo baheze bavyitegurire.
Eka, nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Mu vy’ukuri iyo Qor’ani, ni urwibutso rukwiye ku wushaka kwibuka.
Uwo wese rero ashaka kunyurwa n’iyo Qor’ani, aranyurwa.
Ntibazonyurwa atari uko Imana Allah Ibishatse. Ni Yo Nyenugutinywa Ikagamburukirwa, ni na Yo Nyenimbabazi.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku musi w’izuka ry’ibiremwa n’iharurirwa ryavyo!
Ndanarahiye no ku mutima winegura kenshi[1]! Ko ibiremwa bizozuka.
aya.footnotes: [1] Umutima winegura kenshi ku kudakora ibitegetswe, canke ku gukora ibibujijwe bizira, ni umutima w’umwemeramana.

aya.translation: Mbega, umuntu w’umugarariji yibaza ko Tutazosubira kwegeranya amagufa yiwe inyuma yo gupfa!
Vyobuzwa n’iki! Twebwe Allah Tuzosubira kuyegeranya, ahubwo Turashoboye no kuringaniza intoke n’amakanda yazo nk’uko zari ziri imbere yo gupfa.
Ahubwo rero, umuntu ahakana yivuye inyuma izuka ry’ibiremwa, ashaka ko yoguma mu vyaha;
Maze akabaza atangara n'itebura n'akantu ati: “Mbega izuka ry’ibiremwa rizoshika ryari!”.
Igihe umugarariji yakanutse amaso ku bwoba bw’intureka z’uwo musi;
Ukwezi kukazima, hakaba ubwirakabiri;
Izuba hamwe n’ukwezi bigashirwa hamwe, ntihasubire kuba ijoro n’umurango;
Kuri uwo musi, umuntu azovuga ati: “Ubuhungiro bwo gukira ibihano buri hehe!”.
Muntu! Eka teshwa ute, urahumba! Si nk’uko uvyipfuza, nta buhungiro, eka nta n’ubukiriro;
Kuri uwo musi, amaherezo y’ibiremwa vyose n’ubutururo bwavyo, ni ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah.
Umuntu kuri uwo musi, azomenyeshwa ivyo yakoze vyose; ivyiza n’ibibi, n’ivyo yagizemwo uruhara bigakorwa yarapfuye.
Ahubwo rero, burya umuntu wenyene ku gatwe kiwe, ni isura ku vyo yakoze n’ivyo atakoze;
N’aho yotanga ivyireguzo yisigura ku vyaha yakoze, nta co bizomwungura.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Ntugasubiremwo Qor’ani mu gihe co kuyihishurirwa, imbere yuko umumalayika Jibrili aheraheza, wihutira kuyifata neza ku mutwe ku mpungenge z’uko woyibagira.
Mu vy’ukuri ni Twebwe Allah, Tujejwe kuyitururuza mu mushaha wawe no kugushoboza kuyisoma ku mutwe.
Iyo Intumwa yacu Jibrili iyigusomeye rero, ba ukurikirana igisomwa ata kuyiciramwo.
Hanyuma mu vy’ukuri, ni Twebwe Allah Tujejwe kuyigusigurira.
Babangikanyamana! Teshwa mute, murahumba! Si nk’uko mwibaza ko ata zuka ry’ibiremwa rihari, ahubwo murakunda ivy’isi bisayangana mukarenza urugero;
Mukareka gukora ivyiza bizobafasha mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
Abemeramana kuri uwo musi, bazoba basayangana mu maso, akanyamuneza ku kandi kabasya;
Baraba bitegereza Imana yabo Rurema Allah ukuri kwamye.
Abanyavyaha na bo kuri uwo musi, bazoba bijiriwe mu maso, babihiwe;
Bazi neza ko bashikiwe n’ibihano vy'agacamugongo.
Nateshwe ate, arahumba mu gukunda ivy’ isi! Igihe inkomoko y'ubuzima "Roho" yageze mu muhogo ari ku mpfiro;
Maze uwuri hafi, akabwirwa n’abari ng’aho ati: “Mbega yemwe, ni nde yomukiza!”;
Uwuri ku mpfiro na we azoba yamaze kumenya neza na neza ko hageze gusezera isi;
Maze intureka zo gusezera isi zigahura n’intureka zo gutangura ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, imirundi igafatana atera akagere ka nyuma.
Kuri uwo musi w'izuka ry'ibiremwa rero, ibiremwa bizoshorerwa ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah[2].
aya.footnotes: [2] Ibija mu Bwami bw’ijuru, biterwe iteka ryo kubwinjira; ibija mu muriro udahera na vyo nyene, biteterezwe mu kuwinjira.

aya.translation: Umugarariji, ntiyigeze yemera Intumwa na Qor’ani, eka ntiyigeze anasenga amasengesho-bwirizwa;
Ahubwo yarahakanye Qor’ani yivuye inyuma, yirengagiza n’ukwemera Intumwa;
Hanyuma agenda agana ku muryango wiwe n’amanyama n’ubwirasi n'akantu.
Muhakanyi! Uragahanwa n’Imana Allah! Uragahanwa n’Imana Allah!
Hanyuma kandi, uragahanwa n’Imana Allah! Uragahanwa n’Imana Allah!
Mbega, umuhakanyi w’izuka ry’ibiremwa, yibaza ko azokwihozwa akarekwa uko ashaka, ntahabwe amabwirizwa ngo aheze abazwe ko yayubahirije!
Mbega, ntiyari ima ry’intanga ryakororewe mu gitereko!
Hanyuma aba amaraso avuze, ni uko rero Imana Allah Iraheza Iramurema, Iraringaniza indemo yiwe n’ibihimba vyiwe; kimwe cose aho kigenewe, kibereye;
Hanyuma Imugiramwo ibitsina bibiri: igitsina-gabo canke igitsina-gore.
Mbega Imana Allah Ishoboye gukora ivyo vyose, ntishoboye kuzura abapfuye, Ikabasubiza ubuzima!
Mu vy’ukuri, haraciye igihe kirekire ku muntu atarahuhirwamwo inkomoko y’ubuzima "Roho", ntiyari bwabe ikintu kivugwa.

Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twaremye umuntu mu ntanga zivanze (iz’umugabo n’iz’umugore), kugira Tuzomugerageze mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa, Turaheza Tumugira uwumva, abona, kugira azobazwe ku co yumvise no ku co yabonye.

Mu vy’ukuri, Twaramumenyesheje Turanamutomorera inzira y’ubugororotsi n’iy’ubuhuvyi, iy’ivyiza n’iy’ibibi. Kubera ivyo rero, ashobora guhitamwo kwemera Imana Allah, agashima ivyiza Yamuhaye, canke akagarariza Iyamuremye, agahakana inema zayo.
Mu vy’ukuri, Twarateguriye abagarariji amapingu bazoboheshwa ku maguru, hamwe n’iminyororo bazoboheshwa amaboko yabo mw’izosi, Twarabateguriye n’umuriro wama wegenyejwe.
Mu vy’ukuri aberanda bagamburukira Imana Allah, bazonywa mu Bwami bw’ijuru inzoga itaboreza ivanzwe na “Kaafuuri[1]”.
aya.footnotes: [1] Kaafuuri, ni umwambiro uzoha ibinyobwa akanovera n’akamoto keza.

aya.translation: Ivyo binyobwa, ni iriba riri mu Bwami bw’ijuru, aho abaja b’Imana Allah bicisha bugufi bazonywera, bazoricira inzira baritumbereze aho bashaka;
Bakiri kw’isi rero, barubahiriza ivyo biyemeje “nadhri” bakabishira mu ngiro, bagatinya n'ibihano vyo ku musi, ivyago vyawo bizoba bihambaye, vyugarije hose;
Bakanafungurira n’umukene, impfuvyi n’imbohe, mu gihe na bo nyene bakunda izo mfungurwa kandi banazikeneye;
Mu mitima yabo bakavuga bati: “Ni ukuri, Tubafunguriye ku bw’Imana Allah turondera indishi zayo, ntitubaronderako namba impembo canke gushimwa;
Mu vy’ukuri, dutinya ibihano bivuye ku Mana yacu Rurema Allah, umusi umuntu azokwijirirwa mu maso n’iminkanyari myinshi, kubera intureka z’akataraboneka”.
Abo rero, Imana Allah Izobakingira intureka z’ibihano vy’uwo musi, Yongere Ibasayanganishe mu maso, Ibahe n’akamwemwe ku kandi ku mutima;
Imana Allah Izonabahembera ukuntu bihanganye kw’isi, Ibahe Ubwami bw’ijuru n’impuzu z’iharire yoroshe;
Bazoba bicaye ku bitanda vy'iteka bisharije, biteye igomwe, akayaga keza kabaca irya n’ino, ntibazokwumva ubushuhe bw’izuba canke igikonyozi vy’umurengera;
Bazoba bari mu gatutu k’ibiti vy’aho kari hafi, ivyamwa vya nya biti bizoba vyoroshe kwamura.
Bazohabwa n’abakozi babahereza ku masahani no mu birahuri vy’umwakaka;
Ibirahuri vy’umwakaka bibonerana, birimwo ibinyobwa bipimwe neza ku rugero rw’inyota y’umunywi.
Aho mu Bwami bw’ijuru, bazoherezwa inzoga itaboreza ivanzwe n’itangawizi.
Yengeshejwe amazi y’akanovera y’iriba “Salsabiil”, amanuka neza mu muhogo ata gakatsi.
Bazoba bakikijwe n’imisore myiza ibahereza, ikurakuranwa, iri mu runganwe rumwe, idasaza. Uyibonye, ku bwiza bwayo wogira ngo ni “lulu[2]” zisanzajwe mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
aya.footnotes: [2] Lulu, ni ubwoko bw’ubutare bwiburungushuye, bucukurwa mw’ibahari, bukaba buboneka mu binyabuzima biba musi yaryo, bukagira amabara atandukanye; nk’ibara ryera, iryirabura, n’ayandi. Ni ubutare buzimvye cane.

aya.translation: Aho ubonye hose muri nya Bwami, ubona inema z’akaroruhore n’ubwami bunini buhimbaye.

Bazoba bambaye impuzu z’iharire yoroshe y’urwatsi rubisi, baheze barenzeko n’izindi z'iharire iremereye, bazonaberwa mu kwambikwa imiringa y’umwakaka. Hamwe n’ivyo vyose rero, Imana yabo Rurema Allah, Izobaha ikinyobwa gisukuye, kitagira agakatsi;
Maze babwirwe bati: “Mu vy’ukuri, iyi ni yo mpembo yanyu, ibikorwa vyanyu vyarashimwe n’Imana Allah”.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twaguhishuriye Qor’ani ibicebice, kugira wibutse ibiremwa, uheze uremeshe abemeramana, ugabishe n’abagarariji.

Kubera ivyo rero, ihanganire ingingo y’Imana yawe Rurema Allah ku vyagezwe kuri wewe, uheze uyishime, maze ubandanye ushikirize ubutumwa bwayo, kandi ntukagamburukire umunyavyaha canke umugarariji n’umwe mu babangikanyamana.
Kandi wibuke kuguma uninahaza Imana yawe Rurema Allah no kuyisaba mu gitondo no ku mugoroba.
Mw’ijoro naho, urubamira Imana Allah (usujudu), uheze usenge mu gicugu uyininahaza umwanya munini.
Mu vy’ukuri, abo babangikanyamana bakunda ivy’isi, bakavyitwararika cane, bakareka kwitegurira umusi w’umuhero w’isi uremereye.
Mu vy’ukuri, ni Twebwe Allah Twabaremye, Turaheza Dukomeza ibihimba vy’imibiri yabo. Mu gihe rero Twoshaka, Twobarigita, Tukarema abandi nkabo bagamburukira Imana Allah kubarusha.

Mu vy’ukuri iki gisomwa, ni urwibutso ku biremwa, uwoshaka ineza kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa rero, yogira ukwemera Imana Allah inzira imushikana ku mbabazi n’ishimwa vy’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah.

Kanatsinda, nta co mwoshaka gushikako mu vyo mukora vyose ngo gishoboke, kiretse mu gihe Imana Allah Ibishatse. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, Yamye ari Nyenubumenyikurivyose, Irazi umwe wese muri mwebwe kurusha, Intungane mu vyo Ikora.
Ishira mu mpuhwe zayo uwo Ishaka mu baja bayo. Nayo abirenganije mu kurenga ku mabwirizwa yayo, Yarabateguriye ibihano bibabaza cane.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku miyaga y’urukurikirane!
No ku miyaga y’igihuhusi!
No ku bamalayika bajejwe ikwiragiza ry’ibicu vy’imvura mu kirere!
No ku bamalayika bajana ijambo ry’Imana Allah ritandukanya ukuri n’ikinyoma, rigatandukanya ikirekuwe n’ikizira!
No ku bamalayika bashikiriza ubutumwa barungikanwe ku Ntumwa z’Imana Allah;
Kugira ngo bakureho ivyitwazo ku bagarariji, babagabishe no ku bihano vy’Imana Allah!
Mu vy’ukuri ibi vyose mwagabishijweko[1], nta nkeka ko bizoba ata gisivya.
aya.footnotes: [1] Mu vyerekeye izuka ry’ibiremwa, iharurirwa ryavyo, no ku vyerekeye impera y’umwe wese ku co yakoze. Ivyo vyose rero, nta nkeka ko bitegerezwa kuba.

aya.translation: Igihe inyenyeri zazimye, ntizisubire kwaka;
Igihe n’ijuru ryase imigaga;
Igihe n’imisozi yanyitse;
Igihe n’Intumwa z’Imana zahawe umwanya wo kwagiriza abo zarungitsweko;
Ni ku musi uwuhe zirindirijweko kubagiriza?
Ni ku musi w’ubutungane ku biremwa.
Mbega, ni igiki cokumenyesha uwo musi w’ubutungane uwo ari wo?
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma umusi w’umuhero.
Mbega, ntitwahoneje abahakanyi b’aho hambere ku kubera igarariza ryabo ry’Intumwa!
Hanyuma Tubakurikiza abandi bakurikiye mu nyuma, bakagarariza nkabo!
Ni nk’ukwo nyene rero Twebwe Allah, Tuzogira inkozi z’ikibi mu babangikanyamana b’i Makka bahakanye Intumwa y’Imana (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, Intumwa zayo, izuka ry’ibiremwa n’iharurirwa ryavyo.
Mbega babangikanyamana! Twebwe Allah, ntitwabaremye mu mazi y’intanga agayitse!
Hanyuma Tuyashira mu gitereko gikingiwe c’umugore!
Gushika ku kiringo categekanijwe kizwi n’Imana Allah;
Turaheza Tuyatunganyamwo ikiremwa-muntu gikwiye. Emwe! Ni Twebwe Allah, Abeza bo gutunganya indemo kurusha.
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma ubushobozi bw’Imana Allah bwo kurema no kuzura abapfuye.
Mbega Twebwe Allah, ntitwagize isi kuba iyegeranirizo!
Ry’abagihema bagendagenda kuri yo n’abasandavye bashingurwa muri yo!
Tuyishirako n’imisozi ishimitse miremire kugira ngo iturure, Tubanywesha n’amazi meza y’umusarara!
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma inema z’Imana Allah.
Abamalayika bacungereye umuriro wa Jahannamu, bazobwira abagarariji bati: “Nimugende muri vya bihano mwahora muhakana ko mutazohabwa;
Nimugende mu gitutu c’umuriro wa Jahannamu gifise imfuruka zitatu;
Si igitutu gikingira ubushuhe bw’uwo musi. Ntikizonabuza ko bababurwa n’urubeya rw’umuriro.
Mu vy’ukuri uwo muriro wa Jahannamu, ucira amasase angana n’igorofa amahanga.
Isase rimwe riva muri wo, riguruka rimeze nk’ingamiya z’ibara ryirabura rija gusa n’umuhondo.
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma umusi w’izuka ry’ibiremwa n’intureka zawo.
Uwo musi w’izuka, ni umusi abahakanyi batazoronka ico bavuga cobungura.
Nta n’uburenganzira bazohabwa bwo kuvuga ngo biregure kuko batazoronka ico bireguza.
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma ibizoshika ku musi w’umuhero.

Uwo musi, ni umusi wo gutandukanya ukuri n’ikinyoma, Twabakoranije mwebwe abagarariji mu bantu barungikiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) hamwe n’abagarariji b’aho hambere.
Nimwaba rero mufise uburyo bwo kwigobotora mu bihano, nimubukoreshe muheze mukire ibihano vy’Imana Allah.
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma Imana Allah, Intumwa, Ibitabu vyayo n’umusi w’imperuka.
Mu vy’ukuri, abagamburukiramana batinya ibihano vy'Imana Allah mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa yayo bakiri kw’isi, bazoba bari mu gatutu k'ibiti vy'ivyamwa katigera karenga, ahari n’inzuzi zitemba;
N’ivyamwa bitandukanye mu vyo bipfuza;
Bazobwirwa n'Imana Allah bati: “Nimufungure mwongere munywe n’akayabagu kenshi, ku vyiza mwari mwarakoze kw’isi.
Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, ukwo ni ko Duhemba abagwaneza”.
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma umusi w’impera n’iharurirwa ry’ibiremwa.
Abahakanyi na bo bazoheza babwirwe bakiri kw’isi bati: “Nimufungure, muryoherwe akanya gato. Mu vy’ukuri, mwebwe muri inkozi z’ikibi”.
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma Imana Allah.
Iyo babwiwe bati: “Enda rero nyabuna nimusenge mwunamire Imana Allah, ntibasenga ngo bayunamire”.
Ibihano nya bihano kuri uwo musi, ni ivy’abahakana bivuye inyuma Qor’ani n’amabwirizwa y’Imana Allah.
Batemeye Qor’ani ntagatifu, ni ikihe gitabu inyuma ya Qor’ani bokwemera!
Ababangikanyamana, babazanya ku nkuru nyabaki?
Babazanya ku nkuru ihambaye y’umusi w’izuka ry’ibiremwa, ivugwa muri Qor’ani ntagatifu;
Ari yo badahurizako bigatuma bayihakana bivuye inyuma.
Nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Bitebe bitebuke, bazomenya ukuri kw’iyo nkuru igihe babonye inkurikizi z’igarariza ryabo ku musi w’izuka.
Eka, nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Kandi nibageze aho uguhakana! Bitebe bitebuke, bazomenya ukuri kwa Qor’ani n’ukw’izuka rivugwa muri yo.
Mbega Twebwe Allah, ntitwagize isi nk’isaso!
Tugira n’imisozi nk’imambo ziyigumya!
Tubaremamwo imigwi ibiri; igitsina-gabo n’igitsina-gore!
Tugira n’itiro ryanyu kuba uburuhuro bw’umubiri n’umutima!
Tugira n’ijoro kuba nk’impuzu ipfuka umubiri, iyo umwijima waryo ubanyegeje!
Tugira n’umurango kuba umwanya wo kurondera ikibabeshaho!
Twubaka n’amajuru indwi akomakomeye mu kirere hejuru yanyu!
Tugira n’izuba riba nk’itara ribasusurutsa!
Tumanura n’amazi menshi y’imvura ava mu bicu;
Kugira Tuyanagishe imbuto zifungurwa n’abantu, n’ivyatsi birishwa n’ibikoko;
N’amashamba atotahaye, arimwo ibiti vy’amashami azitanye.
Mu vy’ukuri, umusi w’izuka wo gutunganiriza ibiremwa urafise isango ntarengwa;
Ni umusi hazovuzwa inzamba igira kabiri, mugaca muzuka mu migwimigwi[1];
aya.footnotes: [1] Umugwi wose w’abantu, uzoza uri kumwe n’indongozi yawo mu Ntumwa.

aya.translation: Amajuru na yo akugururwa, akagira imiryango myinshi;
Imisozi na yo igakurwaho, ikaba icirungu[2].
aya.footnotes: [2] Icirungu, ni kurya kuntu ubona ibuheramaso nk’uko hoba hari amazi, ariko wamara kuhagera ntuhasange nya mazi.

aya.translation: Mu vy’ukuri umuriro wa Jahannamu kuri uwo musi, ni uburerekero bw’abahakanyi;
Ku barenga ku mabwirizwa y’Imana Allah, ni bwo buruhukiro bwabo;
Bazowubamwo ibihe n’ibihe bidahera.
Nta mbeho bazokwumvamwo ngo basame akayaga, eka nta n’ikinyobwa bazohabwa ngo bice inyota;
Atari amazi yasebuye akaryimara, urwuya hamwe n’amashira bitemba biva mu mibiri y’abantu bo mu muriro udahera.
Iyo, ni yo mpembo ikwiranye n’ivyo bakoze.
Mu vy’ukuri, ntibigeze batinya umusi w’iharurirwa ngo bawitegurire;
Baraheza barahakana bivuye inyuma Aayah zacu Twebwe Allah, Twarungikanye Intumwa.
Ibintu vyose rero, Twarabibungabunze mu kuvyandika mu Gitabu nyezina canditswemwo ivyagezwe n’ishirwa mu ngiro ryavyo “Lawhu Mahfuudhw”.
Kubera ivyo rero bagarariji, nimwumvirize indishi y’ivyo mwakoze. Nta n’ico Tuzobongererako atari ibihano ku bindi.
Mu vy’ukuri, abatinya ibihano vy'Imana Allah mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa yayo, bazoronka intsinzi y’Ubwami bw’ijuru;
Bazoronkamwo imirima itotahaye hamwe n’imizabibu;
N’inkumi zigishinze amabere, ziri mu runganwe rumwe;
N’ibirahuri vyuzuye inzoga zitaboreza.
Muri ubwo Bwami bw’ijuru, ntibazokwigera bumvamwo amajambo y’imburakimazi, eka ntibazonabeshuzanya.
Ivyo vyose rero, ni impembo ivuye ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah, impembo ikwiye ibereye;
Ni impembo ivuye ku Mana Allah, Mubungabunzi w’amajuru n’isi hamwe n’ibiri hagati yavyo, Nyenimpuhwe ku biremwa. Ntibazoshobora kugira ico bayibajije, kiretse ku vyo Itanzeko uburenganzira;

Ku musi Mutimamweranda Jibrili (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) hamwe n’abandi bamalayika bazotonda ku murongo, nta n’umwe bazovugira, kiretse uwuzohabwa na Nyenimpuhwe Allah uburenganzira bwo kuvugirwa, agaheza akavuga ibitomoye.
Uwo ni wo musi w’ukuri, ata makenga ko uzoshika. Uwushaka gukira intureka zawo rero, nakurikire inzira y’ibikorwa vyiza, imushikana ku Mana yiwe Rurema Allah.

Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twarabagabishije ku bihano biri hafi gushika. Umusi umuntu azobona ivyakozwe n’amaboko yiwe, vyaba ivyiza canke ibibi, maze umugarariji agashoka avuga ati: “Yoo! Amagorwa arama yemwe! Iyo nari gupfuma nibera ivu, simpeze ngo nzuke”.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku bamalayika bashikurana inguvu inkomoko y'ubuzima "Roho" mu mitima y’abagarariji!
No ku bamalayika bakuramwo bukebuke mu bwitonzi inkomoko y'ubuzima "Roho" mu mitima y’abemeramana!
No ku bamalayika baguruka mu kirere banyaruka, bagana mw’ijuru canke bavayo!
No ku bamalayika banyaragasa mu gushira mu ngiro amabwirizwa y’Imana Allah!
No ku bamalayika batunganya mu bukerebutsi nta ngere, ivyo bategetswe gushira mu ngiro kw’isi!
Nta nkeka rero ko muzozurwa mugaharurirwa, umusi isi n’imisozi bizonyiganyiga cane havugijwe inzamba ya mbere yo guhonya ibiremwa;
Hace hakurikira ivuzwa rya kabiri ry’inzamba y’izuka.
Kuri uwo musi rero, imitima y’abagarariji izohinda agashitsi, yugarijwe n’ubwoba n’akantu.
Bazoba bijiriwe mu maso, bajumarariwe;
Abahakana bivuye inyuma izuka ry'ibiremwa, bavuga batebura n'akantu bati: “Mbega, ni ivy’ukuri, tuzosubizwa ubuzima inyuma yo gupfa nk’uko twahora kw’isi!
Ubu nitwaba amagufa yabunzwe, tuzozuka koko!”.
Bazoheza bavuge bihebura bati: “Emwe! Iryo garuka ryacu rero, ni ryaba ari iry'ukuri, rizoba ari iry’agahombo”.
Mu vy’ukuri, rizoba ivuzwa rimwe gusa ry’inzamba ya kabiri;
Maze bace bisanga ari bazima ku mugongo w’isi.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, warashikiriwe n’inkuru ya Musa (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah)!
Igihe Imana yiwe Rurema Allah Yamuhamagara ari mu kabande gatagatifu “Twuwa”, hambavu y’umusozi Sinayi.
Maze Imubwira Iti: “Genda kwa Firawuni, mu vy’ukuri yarimonogoje mu buhakanyi;
Uheze umubwire uti: “Ubwo ntiwokwiyeza, ukemera Imana Imwe Rudende Allah!
Maze nkakurongora mu nzira y’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, ugaheza ukayigamburukira””.
Ni ho rero Musa yereka Firawuni igitangaro gihambaye co guhindura inkoni inzoka.
Firawuni ashoka ahakana yivuye inyuma Musa (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), aranagabitanya ku Mana Allah.
Hanyuma agenza umugongo yirengagiza ukwemera, abandanya ubwononyi bwo guhakana Musa (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah).
Ni ho Firawuni yakoranya abantu, arasemerera;
Avuga ati: “Ni jewe imana yanyu iri hejuru ya vyose”.
Maze Imana Allah Ica Iramwihora, Imuha ibihano vy’akarorero mu buzima bwo kw'isi, Ikazomuha n'ibihano vyo mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
Mu vy’ukuri inyifato ya Firawuni n’ivyamushikiye, harimwo inkebuzo ku bantu batinya ibihano vy'Imana Allah.
Mbega bantu! Izurwa ryanyu, ni ryo ryoba rigoye cane kurusha; canke ukurema ijuru, Imana Allah Yubatse hejuru yanyu, ni co kigoye!
Yahanitse ikirere caryo, Iraheza Irariringaniza.
Igira ijoro ryaryo umwijima iyo izuba rirenze, Ikabonesha umurango waryo iyo riserutse.
Inyuma y’ivyo, Yagura isi Irayisasa, Iyishiramwo ibintu vyose nkenerwa.
Iraserura amariba y’amazi yayo, Imeza n’uburagiro bw’ibitungwa.
Imisozi na yo Irayishinga;
Ivyo vyose Yabibaremeye, kugira muryoherwe mwebwe n’ibitungwa vyanyu[1], muvyikoreko.
aya.footnotes: [1] Izurwa ryanyu rero, rizoba ryoroshe cane ku Mana Allah gusumba irema ry’ivyo vyose Yaremye.

aya.translation: Igihe haje rero ikiza nya kiza c’umusi w’izuka;
Umusi umuntu azokwerekwa ivyo yakoze, aheze avyibuke, anavyemange;
Umuriro ururumba ugashirwa ahabona;
Uwo wese rero, yimonogoje mu buhakanyi;
Agahitamwo ubuzima bwo kw’isi, akirengagiza ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa;
Mu vy’ukuri, umuriro ururumba wa Jahannamu, ni bwo bushikiro bwiwe.
Nayo uwitwararitse kurengutswa imbere y’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, akanareka gukora ivyo umutima wiwe wipfuza;
Mu vy’ukuri, Ubwami bw’ijuru ni ryo cumbi ryiwe.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Ababangikanyamana barakubaza igihe umuhero w’isi uzoberako!
Wewe, nta bumenyi bw’igihe uzoberako ufise.
Ubumenyi bwawo buri ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah.
Wewe gusa, uri umugabisha w’uwutinya akitegurira uwo musi w’umuhero.
Umusi bazowubona, bazomera nk’aho batigeze baba kw’isi, kiretse igihe kingana n’umuhingamo[2] canke umusase gusa[3].
aya.footnotes: [2] Igice c’umusi, kuva izuba rihengamiye mu burengero gushika rirenze. [3] Igice c’umusi, kuva izuba riserutse gushika ku mutaga.

aya.translation: Intumwa (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) yaranyinyiriwe mu maso, irirengagiza;
Bivuye ku kuza kw’impumyi Abdullaahi mwene Ummu Maktuum yaje iyigana ngo iyibaze[1].
aya.footnotes: [1] Ico gihe, Intumwa yariko irararikira abatware b’Abakorayishi kwinjira mu bwislamu.

aya.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ni igiki cogutuma umenya ukuri kw’ikimuzanye, kumbure hari n’aho yokwiyeza!
Canke ikibuka, ukwo kwibuka kukayungura.
Nayo uwibona ko yikenuye, ntashake kwumvira Imana Allah;
Ni we witwararitse kwumviriza!
Kandi nta mwikomo kuri wewe mu gihe atokwiyeza.
Nayo uwuje akugana n’umwitwarariko nta ngere, akaza anyaragasa;
Kandi anatinya ibihano vy'Imana Allah, ashaka ubugororotsi;
Ni we utitayeho ngo umwumvirize.
Si ukwo namba Ntumwa y’Imana! Mu vy’ukuri iki gisomwa ca Qor’ani, ni urwibutso kuri wewe no ku bandi bose.
Uwushaka rero aribuka Imana Allah akurikire Qor’ani ntagatifu;
Iri ku mpapuro zubahitse;
Zubashwe, zisukuye, zitagira akanenge;
Zanditswe n’iminwe y’abanditsi bahishurira Intumwa amajambo y’Imana Allah;
Abamalayika batagatifu, beranda.
Umuntu w’umugarariji yaravumwe; mbega yafashwe n’iki gituma yimonogoza mu kugarariza!
Mbega, ntabona ico Imana Allah Yamuremyemwo!
Yamuremye mw’ima ry’intanga, Iraheza Iramutegekaniriza ubuzima bwiwe;
Hanyuma Imutomorera inzira y’iciza n’iy’ikibi;
Iraheza Iramwica, Iramushingura mu cubahiro;
Hanyuma igihe Yabishatse, Izomuzura, Imusubize ubuzima, kugira Imuharurire Inamuhembere ivyo yakoze.
Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ntarakora ivyo Imana yiwe Rurema Yamutegetse mu mabwirizwa.
Maze umuntu nabanze yitegereze ukuntu Twaremye imfungurwa zimubeshejeho.
Si ivy’imbeshere, Twebwe Allah Twarasukiriye amazi y’imvura kw’isi;
Hanyuma Twatura isi imigaga ibiterwa bitanguye kugonda;
Maze Tuyinagishako intete;
Imizabibu n’ivyatsi vy’ibitungwa;
Imizayituni n’itende;
Amashamba atotahaye azitanye;
Ibiti vy’ivyamwa bitandukanye hamwe n’uburagiriro;
Twaremye ivyo vyose, kugira muryoherwe, mwebwe n’ibitungwa vyanyu, muvyikoreko.
Igihe rero humvikanye ijwi nziba-matwi ry’inzamba yo kuzuka;
Umusi umuntu azohunga mwenewabo kubera intureka;
Akanahunga nyina wiwe, na se wiwe;
Umugore wiwe, n’ibibondo vyiwe;
Umuntu wese, kuri uwo musi azoba arajwe ishinga n’ibimuhanze ku gatwe kiwe.
Uwo musi, abemeramana bazosayangana mu maso;
Batwengatwenga, akanyamuneza nta ngere kabasya.
Uwo musi, hari n’abandi bazoba buzuye inkungugu mu maso, bajumarariwe;
Bijiriwe, babuze ayo bacira n’ayo bamira, bagayitse.
Abo rero, ni bo bagarariji, abagizi ba nabi.
Igihe izuba ryazingwazinzwe ntiribe rigisubira kwaka;
Igihe n’inyenyeri zahungurutse ntizibe zigisubira kuboneka;
Igihe n’imisozi yasunitswe igahoka;
Igihe n’ingamiya zifise amezi zirengagijwe;
Igihe n’inyamaswa zegeranirijwe hamwe, kugira Imana Allah Ihorere izarenganijwe n’izindi;
Igihe n’ibiyaga vyakijwe umuriro bikarurumba;
Igihe n’imishaha yahujwe n’iyindi mishaha hari ico ihuriyeko;
Igihe n’umwigeme yahambwe abona yabajijwe ku musi w’izuka;
Ku co yahowe, kigatuma yicwa mu guhambwa abona!
Igihe n’ibitabu vy’ibikorwa vy’ibiremwa vyashizwe ahabona bikugururwa;
Igihe n’ijuru ryuguruwe rigakurwaho;
Igihe n’umuriro wa Jahannamu wegenyejwe;
Igihe n’Ubwami bw’ijuru bwegerejwe abemeramana;
Ivyo vyose nivyashika, umuntu wese rero azomenya ico yakoze; caba iciza canke ikibi.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku nyenyeri zitaka ku murango!
Zigendera ahatabona mu nzira-ntasobwa zazo!
Ndarahiye kandi no kw’ijoro iyo bwije!
No ku gitondo iyo hakeye bugatamanzura!
Ko mu vy’ukuri iyo Qor’ani, ari ijambo ry’Uhoraho Allah rishikirizwa n’Intumwa yubashwe (Umumalayika Jibrili);
Nyeninguvu n’ubushobozi bwo kwubahiriza amabwirizwa, afise icubahiro kinini imbere ya Nyenubuhangamo Allah;
Agamburukirwa n’abandi bamalayika, umwizigirwa mu guhishurira Intumwa.
Umugenzi wanyu Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), si umusazi namba;
Mu vy’ukuri Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), yarabonye umumalayika Jibrili ukuri kwamye mu buseruko bw’i Makka[1];
aya.footnotes: [1] Iyo, ni yo yari incuro ya mbere Intumwa ibona umumalayika Jibrili. Ico gihe, Intumwa yari mw’isenga ry’ibuye ryitwa HIRAA-A.

aya.translation: Kandi Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), ntiyigungirako ijambo ry’Imana Allah;
Kanatsinda, iyo Qor’ani si ijambo rya shetani yavumwe. Ahubwo ni ijambo ry’Imana Allah.
Mbega, mwebwe mugana hehe, mu guhakana Qor’ani inyuma y’ivyo vyemezo vyose?
Iyo Qor’ani ntagatifu si ikindi, kiretse ko ari urwibutso ku bantu bose;
Kuri uwo wese muri mwebwe ashaka gutumbera inzira igororotse.
Kandi ntimuzoshaka kugororoka ngo mubishobore, kiretse igihe Imana Allah Ibishatse, Umubungabunzi w’ibiremwa vyose.
Igihe ijuru ryasadaguritse;
Igihe n’inyenyeri zahungurutse;
Igihe n’ibiyaga vyagomorowe bigacika kimwe;
Igihe n’imva zazuwe;
Ivyo vyose nivyashika, umuntu wese azomenya ico yakoze n’ico yirengagije, aheze agihemberwe.
Ewe muntu uhakana izurwa ry’ibiremwa! Wahenzwe n’igiki kigutuma ugarariza Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Nyenubugiraneza?
Ni Yo Yakuremye, Iragutunganya, Iranakuringaniza neza;
Yakuremye uko Ishaka mw’ishusho rihambaye.
Bantu ! Nimuteshwe mute murahumba! Murihenda mu gusenga ibigirwamana. Ahubwo mwebwe muhakana mwivuye inyuma umusi w’impera n’iharurirwa.
Mu vy’ukuri, mufise abamalayika bajejwe kubabungabungira ivyo mukora mu kuvyandika;
Batewe iteka n’Imana Allah, bandika vyose ata kibacika;
Barazi ivyo mukora vyose, vyaba ivyiza canke ibibi.
Mu vy’ukuri aberanda bubahiriza agateka k’Imana Allah n’agateka k’ibiremwa, ni ukuri bazoba bari mu nema z’Ubwami bw’ijuru.
Mu vy’ukuri, n’inkozi z’ikibi zitigera zubahiriza agateka k’Imana Allah n’ak’ibiremwa, na zo zizoba ziri mu muriro ururumba;
Zizowinjira, ziwote ku musi w’impera;
Ntizizowukira ngo ziwuvemwo canke ngo zipfe.
Mbega, ni igiki cokumenyesha uwo musi w’impera ico ari co!
Hanyuma, ni igiki cokumenyesha uwo musi w’impera ico ari co!
Ni umusi umuntu ata co azomarira mugenziwe. Itegeko kuri uwo musi, ni iry’Imana Allah Yonyene.
Uguhanwa nya guhanwa, ni ukw’abazirika umunzani n’abadakwiza ingero (igipimo);
Abitwararika gukwirizwa ku munzani n’ingero mu gihe bapimiwe n’abandi bantu.
Iyo naho bapimiye abandi bantu ku ngero canke ku munzani, ntibakwiza urugero.
Mbega, ntibazi ko bazozurwa bakanahemberwa ivyo bakoze!
Ku musi w’intureka zihambaye.
Umusi abantu bose bazohagarara imbere y’Imana yabo Rurema Allah, Umubungabunzi w’ibiremwa vyose, kugira Ibahembere ivyo bakoze vyose.
Nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Mu vy’ukuri, ubushikiro bw’inkozi z’ikibi ni mu kaga “Sijjiini”.
Mbega, ni igiki cokumenyesha akaga “Sijjiini” ico ari co?
Ni ibihano bibabaza vy’akataraboneka bategekanirijwe, vyanditswe mu buryo ata kwihenda kurimwo.
Uguhanwa nya guhanwa, ni ukw’abahakanyi;
Bahakana bivuye inyuma ko hari umusi w’impera.
Nta wuhakana uwo musi atari uwimonogoje mu buhakanyi, umunyavyaha ruhebwa;
Iyo asomewe Aayah zacu za Qo’rani, aca avuga ati: “Ivyo, ni imigani n'ibitito vy’ab'aho hambere”.
Nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Ahubwo ni amajambo y’Imana Allah Yahishuriye Intumwa yayo. Bananiwe kwemera Qor’ani, kuko imitima yabo yaguye ingese, itewe n’ibicumuro bakoze.
Nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Ahubwo mu vy’ukuri, abahakanyi kuri uwo musi w’izuka, bazobuzwa kubona Imana yabo Rurema Allah[1];
aya.footnotes: [1] Iyi Aayah, irerekana ko abemeramana ari bo bazobona Imana yabo Rurema Allah mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

aya.translation: Hanyuma binjire mu muriro ururumba, bawote;
Hanyuma babwirwe n’abamalayika bawucungereye bati: “Ibi, ni vya bihano mwahora muhakana mwivuye inyuma”.
Emwe! Nibateshwe bate barahumba! Mu vy’ukuri, ivyanditswe ku beranda biri ku rwego ruhanitse “Illiyyiina” mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Mbega, ni igiki cokumenyesha urwego ruhanitse “Illiyyiina” ico ari co!
Ni ivyagenewe aberanda, vyanditswe mu buryo ata kwihenda kurimwo;
Bibonwa n’abamalayika b’abishikira.
Mu vy’ukuri aberanda, bazoba bari mu nema z’Ubwami bw’ijuru;
Bicaye ku bitanda bisharije vy'iteka biteye igomwe, baraba Imana yabo Allah hamwe n’ingabirano n’ivyiza bahawe;
Uzobona basayangana mu maso kubera akamwemwe ku kandi gatewe n’inema z’Imana Allah;
Bazoherezwa inzoga zitaboreza, zipfundikiye neza zitwararitswe.
Uwuhejeje kunywa kuri nya nzoga, mu kanwa hasigara akamoto ka “Miski”. Mu gutsindira izo nema rero, nibarushanwe abarushanwa.
Iyo nzoga yengeshejwe amazi ya “Tasniim”;
Ni iriba, abatoni b’Imana Allah bazonywako.
Mu vy’ukuri abahakanye Imana Allah, bahora batwenga abemeramana bakiri kw’isi;
Mu gihe babarenganye, bavunanira urugohe ku gasuzuguro;
Mu gihe naho batashe mu miryango yabo, bagataha baryohewe batera inkuru z’ukuntu basuzuguye abemeramana;
Iyo naho babonye ingendanyi zamaze kwemera Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), bavuga bati: “Mu vy’ukuri, abo ni bo bahuvye, bari mu muzimiza”.
Kanatsinda, ntibatumwe kugira ngo bazicungere.
Uno musi w’izuka rero, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo, baratwenga abagararije basuzuguritse mu bihano;
Abemeramana bazoba bicaye ku bitanda vy'iteka bisharije biteye igomwe, baraba Imana yabo Allah hamwe n’ingabirano n’ivyiza bahawe;
Bazovuga bati: “Mbega yemwe! Abagarariji boba bahembewe ivyo bari barakoze kw’isi?”.
Igihe ijuru ryasadutse rigatabuka ku musi w’umuhero w’isi;
Rikumvira Imana yaryo Rurema Allah, kandi ritegerezwa nta kibuza;
Igihe n’isi yasanjwe;
Igasohora abantu n’ubutare biri muri yo, igasigara igaragara;
Ikumvira Imana yayo Rurema Allah, kandi itegerezwa nta kibuza.
Ewe muntu! Mu vy’ukuri wewe, ugana ku Mana Allah, ukita ku rutare mu bikorwa, vyaba vyiza canke bibi, kugeza aho uzohura n’Imana yawe Rurema Allah Ikabiguhembera.
Uwo wese rero azohabwa igitabu c’ibikorwa vyiwe mu kuboko kwiwe kw’iburyo;
Uyo, ni we azoharurirwa ibiharuro vyoroshe;
Maze agasubira mu bantu biwe mu Bwami bw’ijuru akanyamuneza kamusya.
Nayo uwuzohabwa igitabu c’ibikorwa vyiwe inyuma y’umugongo wiwe;
Uyo rero, azoheza yisabire urupfu;
Yinjire no mu muriro wama wegenyejwe;
Kuko mu vy’ukuri, yahorana akanyamuneza mu muryango wiwe akiri kw’isi, nta co yategekanirije uyu musi.
Mu vy’ukuri, yibaza ko atazosubira ku Mana yiwe Allah ngo Imuharurire.
Yobuzwa n’iki gusubira ku Mana Allah! Mu vy’ukuri Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, Yamye ari Nyenukubona, Yaramubona we n’ivyo yakora.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku bicu bitukura bugorovye!
No kw’ijoro n’ivyo rinyegeje!
No ku kwezi iyo gukwijije umuco mu mfato!
Bantu! Ni ukuri muzohura n’ibihe bigoye bisumbasumbana[726].
aya.footnotes: [726] Umuntu wese aremwa mw’ima ry’intanga, rigahinduka amaraso avuze; nya maraso avuze agahinduka igihimba c’inyama; hanyuma nya gihimba c’inyama kigahuhirwamwo inkomoko y’ubuzima “Roho”. Yamara kuvuka akabaho, hanyuma agapfa, akazozuka, agashorerwa kw’iyegeranirizo ry’ibiremwa, hanyuma agaharurirwa.

aya.translation: Mbega, abantu babuzwa n’iki kwemera Imana Allah n’umusi w’iherezo, kandi basomerwa Aayah za Qor’ani zitomoye!
N’iyo basomewe Qor’ani, ntibubamira Imana Allah ngo bemere amabwirizwa yayo.
Ahubwo abagararije bahakana Qor’ani bivuye inyuma, izuka n’iharurirwa ry’ibiremwa.
Burya Imana Allah, ni Yo Izi neza ivyo bahishije mu mishaha yabo.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Bashikirize rero inkuru y'incamugongo yo guhabwa ibihano bibabaza.
Ariko abantu bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barafise impembo idahera bagenewe mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru rifise inzira-ntasobwa z’izuba n’ukwezi!
No ku musi w’isango ryategekanijwe ry’izuka ry’ibiremwa!
No ku cabona cagiriza no ku wagirizwa[1]!
aya.footnotes: [1] Imana Allah, Irahira ku co Ishatse mu biremwa, nayo ikiremwa ntikirekuriwe kurahira kiretse kw’izina ry’Imana Allah, kurahira ku kitari Imana Allah, ni ibangikanyamana.

aya.translation: Harahonejwe abantu Benibinogo amahanga bimbiye abemeramana;
Baraheza bavyatsamwo umuriro wenyegejwe;
Igihe bari bicaye hambavu yavyo;
Bitegereza ivyo bakorera abemeramana mu bihano.
Nta na kimwe babahoye atari uko bemera Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Nyenugushimwa, Ishimwa ku mazina, amatazirano n’ibikorwa vyayo mu bihe vyose.
Ni Yo Nyenubwami, Igaba Ikaganza amajuru n’isi n’ibiri muri vyo vyose. Burya Imana Allah, Irazi ikintu ico ari co cose.

Mu vy’ukuri, abatoteje abemeramana n’abemeramanakazi mu kubaturira kugira bavavanure n’idini ry’Imana Allah, hanyuma ntibigaya ku Mana Allah ngo basabe imbabazi, abo bazohanwa mu muriro wa Jahannamu, baranategekanirijwe ibihano vyo guturirwa.

Mu vy’ukuri, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barategekanirijwe imirima itotahaye mu Bwami bw’ijuru, musi y’ibiti n’inyubakwa vyabwo hatemba inzuzi. Iyo, ni yo ntsinzi ihambaye.
Mu vy’ukuri, uguhana kw’Imana yawe Rurema Allah kurahambaye.
Mu vy’ukuri, ni Yo Yatanguje kurema ibiremwa vyose ata co Irinze gufatirako, kandi ni Yo Izobisubiza ubuzima, biheze bizuke.
Ni na Yo Nyenimbabazi-ntangere ku bigaya, Nyenurukundo-ntangere ku batoni bayo.
Nyenubuhangamo, Nyeniteka.
Ikorana ubwira ico Ishatse, ntakiyinanira.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, woba warashikiriwe n’inkuru y’ivyashikiye ingabo z’abagarariji!
Ingabo za Firawuni n’iza Bene Thamuudi!
Ahubwo abagararije Imana Allah bishinga kubandanya bahakana nk’ab’aho hambere.
Burya Imana Allah na Yo ku bushobozi n’ubumenyi vyayo, Irabakikuje ku mpande zose, nta buhungiro.
Iyo Qor’ani bahakana, si amajambo y’abantu! Ahubwo, ni Qor’ani ntagatifu;
Yanditswe ku kibaho kibungabunzwe neza “Lawhu Mahfuudhw”.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru no ku giserukajoro!
Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co igiserukajoro?
Ni inyenyeri yakaka.
Ndarahiye kuri ivyo vyose, ko ata muntu n’umwe kiretse ko afise umubungabunzi azigama ibikorwa vyiwe mu bamalayika, kugira azobihemberwe!
Umuntu ahakana izuka ry’ibiremwa rero, niyitegereze ico yaremwemwo, aheze amenye ko izurwa ryiwe ritagoye nk’iremwa ryiwe!
Yaremwe mu mazi y’intanga asunitswe mu gitereko;
Avuye hagati y’uruti rw’umugongo w’umugabo n’igikiriza c’umugore.
Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah Yaremye umuntu mu mazi y’intanga, Irashoboye no kumugarura inyuma yo gupfa Ikamusubiza ubuzima, akazuka.
Umusi amabanga azoshirwa ahabona, ivyiza bikamenyekana n’ibibi bikagaragara;
Umuntu nta bubasha azoba afise bwo kwikingira ibihano, eka nta n’umutabazi amukura mu bihano azoronka.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru ryenimvura yisubiriza iyo amazi kw’isi ayaze agasubira mu kirere!
No kw’isi yiyata imigaga iyo ibiterwa bigondoye!
Ko mu vy’ukuri, iyo Qor’ani ari amajambo atandukanya ukuri n’ikinyoma;
Si n’iyo kujajura.
Mu vy’ukuri, abahakana Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) hamwe na Qor’ani, bakoresha urwenge mu kurwanya ukuri.
Nanje Allah Nkabahinyura mu kugaragaza ukuri gushika aho gutsinda.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Kubera ivyo rero, tenyenyera abagarariji, ntiwihutire kubasabira ibihano, bihorere ubarindire gato, bazokwibonerako bidatevye.
Ninahaza izina ry’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Nyenicubahiro-ntangere (uvuge uti: “Sub-haana Rabbiya l-A’laa”).
Yararemye ibiremwa, maze Iraringaniza indemo yavyo n’ibihimba; kimwe cose aho kigenewe, kibereye;
Iraheza Irategekanya ivya nkenerwa vyose ku biremwa, Iranigisha kimwe cose ukuntu kivyikorako;
Iranagisha n’uburagiro (ubwatsi);
Hanyuma Irabukavya, busa n’urwatsi rutoto ruja kwirabura.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Twebwe Allah, Tuzokwigisha Qor’ani, ntuzoyibagira namba;
Kiretse ico Imana Allah Ishatse ko wibagira ku neza y’ibiremwa. Mu vy’ukuri, ni Yo Izi ibigaragara mu bikorwa no mu majambo n’ibinyegeje muri vyo.
Tuzokworohereza gukora ivyoroshe; nko kwihanganira ishikirizabutumwa no kworoherezwa amabwirizwa y’idini.
Kubera ivyo rero, ibutsa abantu bawe warungitsweko gutumbera inzira igororotse, na canecane kwibutsa uwitezwe ko yibuka, nya kwibuka kukamugirira akamaro;
Hazokwibuka uwutinya ibihano vy'Imana Allah.
Uwaseserejwe n’ivyaha na we, azoheza yigire kure y’urwo rwibutso;
Ari na we azokwinjira mu muriro udahera ukaze bihambaye;
Hanyuma ntazopfa muri wo ngo awuruhuke, eka ntazonawugiriramwo ubuzima buhimbaye.
Mu vy’ukuri yaramaze gutsinda, umuntu yiyejeje amabi;
Akaninahaza n’izina ry’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, maze agasenga amasengesho-bwirizwa ku mwanya, arondera gushimwa na Yo.
Bantu! Ahubwo rero, mushira imbere kurusha ubuzima bw’ibihendamaso vyo kw’isi;
Kandi ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, ari bwo bwiza gusumba, kandi bwamaho.
Mu vy’ukuri, ivyo vyose mwadondaguriwe muri iki gisomwa, biri no mu Bitabu vy’aho hambere ya Qor’ani;
Mu Mizingo y’Intumwa z’Imana Ibrahimu na Musa (za nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah).
Mbega Ntumwa y’Imana! Warashikiriwe n’inkuru y’umusi uhwikira ibiremwa!
Uwo musi, abagarariji bazosuzugurika bijirirwe mu maso kubera ibihano;
Bakore bita ku rutare, baruhe;
Bazokwinjira mu muriro udahera, unyengetera cane;
Banyweshwe mw’iriba ry’amazi asebura akaryimara;
Nta mfungurwa bazohabwa atari amahwa yumye;
Ntavyibusha namba eka ntanavuna n’inzara (ntanahembura) na gato.
Uwo musi rero, abemeramana bazorangwa n’akamwemwe mu maso;
Bashime mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa ibikorwa vyabo bakoze kw’isi;
Bazoba bari mu Bwami bw’ijuru bw’iteka;
Ntibazokwumvamwo insaku n’amajambo ata co amaze;
Harimwo iriba ry’amazi atemba;
Harimwo n’ibitanda vy’icubahiro bihanitse;
N’ibirahuri bishinguwe neza, vyabategekanirijwe;
N’imisego itondeshejwe neza;
N’ibisaswa vy’iteka bishashwe neza.
Mbega yemwe, abagarariji ntibitegereza ingamiya ingene yaremwe!
N’ijuru ingene ryahanitswe, ata nkingi!
N’imisozi ingene yashimitswe!
N’isi ingene yashashwe, yagutse!
Ntumwa y’Imana! Kubera ivyo rero, Ibutsa abirengagiza ukuri, ko mu vy’ukuri wewe ujejwe kwibutsa gusa;
Wewe ntushinzwe kubahatira kwemera.
Ariko uwugenza umugongo, agatsimbatara mu kugarariza;
Uyo, Imana Allah Izomuha ibihano ruhasha mu muriro.
Mu vy’ukuri, igaruka ryabo - nibazuka - ni iwacu Twebwe Allah;
Hanyuma, nta nkeka ko ari Twebwe Allah, Tujejwe kubaharurira ku musi w’impera.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku mutwenzi!
No ku majoro cumi ya mbere yo mu kwezi kwa 12, Dhul-Hijja!
No kuri bibiribibiri na nyahagwe!
No kw’ijoro iyo rihise! Ko abahakanyi bazohanwa;
Ubwo muri ivyo, ntiharimwo indahiro ikwiye ku wufise ubwenge!
Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, ntiwabonye ingene Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yagize Bene Aadi igihe c’Intumwa Huudi (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah)!
Ubwoko bwa Iramu, beninguvu n’amazu maremare;
Nta baremwe nkabo mu bindi bisagara mu ngimba n’inguvu bari bafise.
Ntiwabonye n’ukuntu Yagize Bene Thamuudi, babaza amazu mu mabuye mu kabande igihe c’Intumwa Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah)!
Ntiwabonye kandi ukuntu Yagize Firawuni nyeningabo zatsimbataje ubwami bwiwe muri Misiri!
Abo bose, barimonogoje mu bugizi bwa nabi, mu bihugu vy’Imana Allah;
Baraheza bakwiragizamwo ubwononyi bwinshi;
Maze Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Ica Irabamanurira ibihano bibakwiye.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Mu vy’ukuri Imana yawe Rurema Allah, ni Umureretsi w’ivyo bakoze, Iratenyenya ntiyibagira.

Nayo umuntu, iyo Imana yiwe Rurema Allah Imugerageje, Ikamutera iteka ry’ubutegetsi canke ry’ubutunzi, araheza akibaza ko biturutse ku butore bwiwe, agaca avuga ati: “Imana yanje Rurema Allah, Yaranteye iteka nta ngere”.
Iyo naho Imugerageje, Ikamugerera mu vyo Imuronsa bimubeshaho, araheza akibaza ko biturutse ku gasuzuguro, agaca avuga ati: “Imana yanje Rurema Allah, Yaransuzuguye”.
Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ariko guhabwa iteka guturuka ku kwumvira Imana Allah; gusuzugurwa na kwo, kugaturuka ku kugabitaniriza Imana Allah. Ahubwo rero mwebwe, ntimwitaho impfuvyi ngo muzifashe;
Ntimunahimirizanya gufungurira abakene;
Mukarya mukuzako n’amatungo y’abandi mu bisigi;
Mugakunda n’amatungo urukundo rurenze.
Nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Ntimwategerezwa kuba ukwo. Igihe rero isi yahondwahonzwe;
Imana yawe Rurema Allah na Yo, Ikaza gutunganiriza ibiremwa, abamalayika na bo batonze ku murongo;
Umuriro wa Jahannamu na wo kuri uwo musi, ugashirwa ahabona; uwo musi, umuntu w’umugarariji azokwikebuka yibuke kwigaya, ariko rero ukwo kwibuka akigaya, nta co kuzomumarira.
Azovuga yicuza ati: “Ubona iyo nkora nkiri kw’isi ivyomfasha muri ubu buzima bwanje bw’inyuma yo gupfa!”.
Kuri uwo musi rero, nta wuzohana umuhakanyi bikwiye nk’igihano c’Imana Allah.
Kandi nta wuzoboha nk’Imana Allah mu kudadira umuhakanyi.
Iyo umwemeramana apfuye, abwirwa ati: “Ewe mutima utekanishijwe n’ininahaza n’itaziramana hamwe n’ukwemera Imana Allah!
Subira ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah wishimiye impera yayo, wishimiwe n’Iyakuremye Allah;
Uheze winjire rero mu mugwi w’abaja banje beranda;
Winjire no mu Bwami bwanje bw’ijuru”.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kuri iki gisagara ceranda ca Makka!
Kikaba ari na co wewe Intumwa Muhamadi urekuriwe gukoreramwo ico ushatse[1].
aya.footnotes: [1] Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), yarekuriwe gukorera mu gisagara ca Makka ico ishatse, harimwo n’indwano mu kiringo kitarenga isaha imwe ku mutaga. Iyi Aayah, irerekana ko Intumwa (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), izokwigarurira ico gisagara habanje kuba indwano.

aya.translation: Ndarahiye kandi no ku kiremwa kivyara (ari co Adamu) n’ikivyarwa (mu rwaruka rwiwe)!
Ko mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah Twaremye, ikiremwa-muntu kizohura n’umuruho ku wundi kw’isi kugeza gupfa.
Mbega umuntu kubera amatungo yegeranije, yibaza ko ata wuzoshobora kumugonda!
Avuga yihaya ngo: “Naratanze amatungo menshi cane!”.
Mbega, yibaza ko ata n’umwe amubona akazomuhera ku vyo yakoze, vyaba bike canke vyinshi!
Mbega, Twebwe Allah Ntitwamuhaye amaso abiri abonesha!
Tumuha n’ururimi hamwe n’iminwa ibiri, kugira ashobore gutomora ijambo!
Dutako Turamumenyesha Tumutomorera inzira zibiri, iy’iciza n’iy’ikibi, kugira ngo yihitiremwo!
Mbega, ubwo ntiyotanga amatungo yiwe akabona kuruhuka umuruho wo mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa!
Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co umuruho wo mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa n’icowugukiza!
Ni uguha umugurano w’umwemeramana ubwigenge;
Canke ugufungurira mu gihe c’inzara izura inzara;
Impfuvyi ya hafi mu muryango[2];
aya.footnotes: [2] Ugaheza ukaronka indishi zo gutanga imperezwa n’izo kwunga ubuvandimwe.

aya.translation: Canke umworo ata co yimariye (ata gira shinge na rugero).
Inyuma yo gukora ivyo vyose, umuntu akaba ari mu bemeramana, bahanurana kwihanganira kwumvira Imana Allah no kutayigabitanyiriza, bakanahanurana kugirira impuhwe ibiremwa.
Abo barangwa n’ivyo rero, ni bo bantu bo mu ruhande rw’iburyo, bazoruhukira mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Nayo abagararije Aayah zacu za Qor’ani, abo ni bo bantu bo mu ruhande rw’ibubamfu;
Bazoba bapfundikiriwe mu muriro ubakikuje ku mpande zose.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku zuba no ku muco waryo mu gitondo!
No ku kwezi iyo gukurikiye izuba rirenze n’iyo riserutse!
No ku murango iyo hakeye, umwijima w’ijoro ugaherengetera!
No kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse isi hakijima!
No kw’ijuru n’ukuntu ryubatse!
No kw’isi n’ukuntu ishashe, kugira ibiremwa bishobore kuyibako!
No ku mushaha w’ikiremwa ico ari co cose n’ukuntu watunganijwe n’Imana Allah!
Igaheza Ikawumenyesha mu kuwutomorera inzira y’inabi n’iy’ineza!
Ni ukuri yaratsinze, uwejeje umushaha agakora ivyiza.
Kandi ni ukuri yarahomvye ubuzima bwiwe, uwasibije umushaha agakora ivyaha.
Bene Thamuudi barahakanye Intumwa y’Imana Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), kubera ukwimonogoza kwabo mu gukora ivyaha;
Igihe hiyadukiza inkozi y’ikibi muri bo[1] kugira ice imitsi ingamiya;
aya.footnotes: [1] Yitwa Kubaru mwene Salifu.

aya.translation: Intumwa y’Imana Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), iraheza ibabwira iti: “Mwoye gukomakoma ingamiya yarungitswe n’Imana Allah, mwiyubare kuyivogera ku musi wayo yagenewe gushoka kunywa”.
Maze barayigarariza batako baraca imitsi ya nya ngamiya. Imana yabo Rurema Allah Ica Irabahana, Irabahonya bose ata n’umwe arokotse, kubera ibicumuro vyabo.
Kandi Imana Allah, ntitinya inkurikizi z’ibihano Yabahaye.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse ibintu vyose kw’isi!
No ku murango iyo hakeye, hakabona!
No kw’irema ry’igitsina-gabo n’igitsina-gore!
Bantu! Mu vy’ukuri ibikorwa vyanyu biri kwinshi; muri mwebwe harimwo uwukorera isi, hakabamwo n’uwukorera ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
Uwo wese rero azotanga atiziganya mu matungo yiwe ku bw’Imana Allah, akanagamburuka;
Akanemera ijambo “LAA ILAAHA ILLA LLAAH[1]”, ivyo ryigisha, ivyo risaba n’indishi zaryo;
aya.footnotes: [1] Nta mana ibwirijwe gusengwa vy’ukuri atari Imana Imwe Rudende Allah.

aya.translation: Uyo rero Twebwe Allah, Tuzomworohereza mu buzima bwo kw’isi, Tunamushoboze gukora ivyiza bimushikana mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Nayo uwuzoba ingumyi mu gutanga, ntanakenere indishi ku Mana Allah;
Agahakana n’ijambo “LAA ILAAHA ILLA LLAAH”, ivyo ryigisha, ivyo risaba n’indishi zaryo;
Uyo, Twebwe Allah Tuzomworohereza gukora ibimushikana ku magorwa yo mu muriro udahera;
Amatungo yiwe, nta n’ico azomumarira igihe yahanantukiye mu muriro udahera.
Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Tujejwe kwerekana inzira igororotse iganisha mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Kandi mu vy’ukuri, ni Twe Tugaba Tukaganza ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa n’ubwo kw’isi.
Ni na co gituma Ndababuriye - bantu - Ndanabatinyisha n’ibihano vyo mu muriro ururumba.
Nta wuwinjiramwo ubutavayo atari uwimonogoje mu bugarariji;
Uwuhakana Umuvugishwamana Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), agaheza akagenza umugongo yirengagiza ukwemera Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo.
Hazokwegezwa kure y’uwo muriro, uwugamburukira Imana Allah bikwiye;
Uwutanga amatungo yiwe ku bw’Imana Allah, arondera kubandanya yiyeza;
Kandi nta n’umwe agirira ineza mu ntumbero yo gusubirizwa mu ndumane;
Ariko agira ineza arondera gushimwa n’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, Nyenicubahiro-ntangere.
Kandi nta kibuza ko azoshima impera n’inema zayo mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku gihe c’umutaga!
No kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse ibiremwa bigaturura!
Ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah Itaguhevye Muvugishwamana; kandi ko Itanagushavuriye ku guteba kw’ihishurirwa rya Qor’ani.
Nta nkeka rero ko ubuzima bwawe bw’inyuma yo gupfa, ari bwiza kurusha ubwo kw’isi.
Kandi nta nkeka ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Izoguha vyinshi uzoheza ugashima.
Muvugishwamana! Mbega, Imana Allah ntiyagusanze uri impfuvyi, Ikakubungabunga!
Igusanga utazi ico ari co Igitabu, n’ico ari co ukwemera! Iraheza Irakwigisha ivyo utari uzi, Inagushoboza gukora n'ivyiza bitegetswe!
Igusanga ukenye maze Iragukenura, Iguha ukwihangana no kubumbwa n’ivyo ufise!
Kubera ivyo rero, ntukaryagumbe impfuvyi ngo uyihahaze.
Nayo uwusavye gufashwa canke kwigishwa, ntukamuburabuze, ahubwo muhe unamutunganirize;
Nayo inema z’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, ziyage ushima.
Muvugishwamana! Mbega, Twebwe Allah, ntitwakwaguriye igikiriza cawe mu kuguha ukwihangana, kugira ushobore kwakira ubutumwa no kubushikiriza!
Turaheza Tugukurako umutwaro (w’uko abantu bawe warungitsweko batotumbera inzira)!
Umutwaro wari uremereye umugongo wawe;
Gutyo, ku kubera imigenzo myiza wahawe, Tukudugiriza icubahiro.
Ntuzobuzwe rero n’ibangamirwa ry’abakwanka, gushikiriza ubutumwa. Burya mu vy’ukuri, akaga n’agahengwe biragendana.
Burya mu vy’ukuri, akaga n’agahengwe biragendana.
Kubera ivyo rero, iyo uhejeje gutunganya ibikenewe mu vy’isi, senga ushimire Imana Allah;
Unatakambe cane urondera ibiri ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kuri “Tiini” na “Zayituuni[1]” (vyahezagiwe)!
aya.footnotes: [1] Tiini na Zayituuni, ni ubwoko bw'ivyamwa.

aya.translation: No ku musozi wa Sinayi, ari na ho Intumwa Musa (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), yavuganiye n’Imana Allah ukuri kwamye!
No kuri iki gisagara ca Makka gitekanye!
Ni ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twaremye umuntu mw’ishusho ryiza cane;
Hanyuma Tumusubiza mu muriro udahera, mu gihe atokwumvira Imana Allah agakurikira n’Intumwa zayo.
Ariko rero abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barategekanirijwe impembo itagabanijwe, idahera.
Muntu! None ni igiki gituma inyuma y’ivyo vyose, uhakana wivuye inyuma umusi w’impera!
Mbega burya Imana Allah, Yategekanije umusi wo gutunganiriza ibiremwa, si Yo Nyene kugira ubutungane bubereye ku biremwa vyayo gusumba abacamanza bose! Yobuzwa n’iki! Ego cane, ni Yo!
Muvugishwamana! Soma ivyo wahishuriwe muri Qor’ani, maze utangure kw’izina ry’Imana yawe Allah Yaremye;
Yaremye zina kiremwa-muntu mu maraso avuze.
Muvugishwamana! Soma ivyo wahishuriwe muri Qor’ani, wizeye ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah ari Yo Mugiraneza-ntangere;
Yigishije ibiremwa kwandika n’ikaramu;
Yigishije kiremwa-muntu ivyo kitari kizi, Iraheza Igikura mu muzimagiza w’ubujuju Igishira mu muco w’ubumenyi.
Si ivy’imbeshere ko umuntu yama yarenze ku mabwirizwa y’Imana Allah ku bwishime;
Abitewe n'uko abonye yamaze kwikenura agatunga;
Mu vy’ukuri uburuhukiro bwiwe, ni ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah, Izomuhembera ivyo yakoze.
Mbega, warabonye igitangaje kurusha umuntu[1] aburabuza;
aya.footnotes: [1] Ni umuhakanyi yarwanije cane Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), yitwa Abu Jahli.

aya.translation: Umuja[2] w’Imana Allah mu gihe ariko arasenga!
aya.footnotes: [2] Yaburabuje umuja w’Imana Muhamadi gusenga.

aya.translation: Mbega, ubona gute mu gihe uyo aburabuzwa ugusenga, yoba ari mu nzira igororotse!
Canke akaba ariko arabwiriza gukora iciza c'igamburukiramana!
Mbega, ubona gute mu gihe uyo aburabuza ugusenga, yoba ahakana ubutumwa, akagenza umugongo yirengagiza ukwemera Allah!
Mbega, ntazi neza ko Imana Allah Ibona ivyo akora!
Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ni ukuri, ataretse kurwanya Intumwa, Tuzomufatira mu ruhanga, maze Tumujungunyire mu muriro;
Uruhanga rw’umubeshi, umunyavyaha;
Arahamagara rero abateramyi biwe baze bamutabare;
Na Twe Allah, Tuzoheza Duhamagare abamalayika b’ibihangange “Al-Zabaaniya”;
Ntumwa y’Imana! Nateshwe ate, arahumba mu kwibaza ko azoguturatuza. Ntukamwumvire ngo ureke gusenga, tsimbatara ku kwubamira Imana Allah, uheze ubandanye uyiyegereze unikundwakaze kuri Yo.
Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twamanuye Qor’ani mw’ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere mu kwezi kwa Ramadhani.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere?
Ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere, ni ijoro iciza gikozwe muri ryo, gisumba mu ndishi iciza gikozwe mu mezi igihumbi atagiramwo iryo joro[1].
aya.footnotes: [1] Iyo ni impano, Imana Allah Yageneye gusa abantu barungikiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

aya.translation: Muri ryo, hamanuka abamalayika ku bwinshi bari kumwe na Mutimamweranda Jibrili, kw’itegeko ry’Imana yabo Rurema Allah, bagaheza bakerekwa n’ivyagezwe vyose vyo muri uwo mwaka.
Iryo joro rero, ni amahoro masa gushika umutwenzi ukitse.
Abagararije mu bahawe Igitabu no mu babangikanyamana, ntibari kugera aho bavavanura n’ubugarariji, kugeza bashikiriwe n’icemeza kiboneka;
Ico cemeza, ni Intumwa ivuye ku Mana Allah, yaje ibasomera Qor’ani yanditswe ku mpapuro zitagiramwo agasembwa, zisukuye.
Harimwo ibimenyetso n’amategeko atomoye, arongora mu nzira igororotse.

Abahawe Igitabu, ntibiciyemwo imigwi ku vyerekeye ukwemera umuzo w’Intumwa Muhamadi[1], kiretse inyuma y’aho bashikiriwe n’icemeza kiboneka, cemeza ko Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana), ari yo Ntumwa y’Imana Allah basezeraniwe mu Bitabu vyabo.
aya.footnotes: [1] Abahawe Igitabu, bari basanzwe bazi neza ibiranga Intumwa igiye kuza, baranemera ko ari Intumwa y’ukuri bisunze ibiyiranga, ariko iyo Ntumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana) imaze kuza, bariciyemwo imigwi; muri bo hari abayemeye baranayikurikira, hari n’abayihakanye baranayirwanya biturutse kw’ishari n’akarenganyo.

aya.translation: Nta n’ikindi bategetswe gukora mu mabwirizwa bahawe, atari ukwiyegereza Imana Allah mu vyo bakora vyose banayisenga ari Imwe Rudende, beze idini ryayo batayibangikanya, batsimbataze n’amasengesho ku mwanya, banatange n’ishikanwa-bwirizwa. Iryo rero, ni ryo dini ry’ukuri, ni na bwo bwislamu.
Mu vy’ukuri, abagararije mu bahawe Igitabu n’ababangikanyamana, bazohanwa mu muriro wa Jahannamu, bazowubamwo ibihe bidahera. Abo rero, ni bo babi cane mu biremwa.
Mu vy’ukuri, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bagakora n’ivyiza bitegetswe; abo rero, ni bo beza cane mu biremwa;

Impembo yabo ku Mana yabo Rurema Allah, ni imirima itotahaye yo mu Bwami bw’ijuru rya “Adeni”, musi y’inyubakwa n’ibiti vyabwo hatemba inzuzi, bazobubamwo ibihe bidahera, mu nema zamaho. Imana Allah Yarabashimiye ku vyo bakoze, na bo nyene barayishimiye ku mpera Yabageneye. Iyo, ni yo mpembo y’uwatinye gucumura ku Mana yiwe Rurema Allah.
Igihe isi yanyiganyijwe nya kunyiganyizwa;
Maze isi igasohora ibiri muri yo vyose; abapfuye hamwe n’ubutare;
Umuntu akicwa n’ubwoba n’akantu abaza ati: “Mbega yemwe! Isi yashikiwe n’iki?”.
Uwo musi, isi izoshikiriza inkuru z’ivyayikoreweko vyose; vyaba ivyiza canke ibibi;
Kuko Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yayitegetse.
Uwo musi, abantu bazozuka bari imigwimigwi, kugira berekwe n’Imana Allah ibikorwa vyabo, Inabibahembere.
Uwo wese rero akora iciza n’aho coba kingana n’akanyegeri, azobona indishi yaco mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
N’uwukora ikibi n’aho coba kingana n’akanyegeri, na co nyene azobona igihano caco mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ifarasi zirukanga zihezuka mu gutera umwansi ku rugamba rwo guharanira Imana Allah!
N’iziruka ibinono bigacira amasase!
N’izitera umwansi mu gitondo!
Maze zigasura intumo mu kwiruka!
Zigana hagati y’abansi!
Mu vy’ukuri, umuntu ni intashima y’inema z’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah.
Mu vy’ukuri na we nyene kuri ivyo, ni icabona.
Mu vy’ukuri, umuntu mu gukunda amatungo ararengeje.
Mbega umuntu ntazi ibizoba bimurindiriye, igihe Imana Allah Yazuye abapfuye bava mu mva zabo kugira baharurirwe;
Hakanerekanwa n’ibiri mu mishaha (ivyiza canke ibibi)!
Mu vy’ukuri Imana yabo Rurema, kuri uwo musi, Irazi neza ivyo bakoze, nta na kimwe Iyobewe.
Umusi nkuramutima.
Mbega, ni igiki umusi nkuramutima?
Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co umusi nkuramutima?
Ni umusi, abantu bazozuka batagira iyo baja n’iyo bava, bashwiragiye nk’ibinyugunyugu bishwiragijwe;
N’imisozi ikaba nk’ubwoya bw’isufi[1] busanzajwe, butumuriwe hejuru n’umuyaga.
aya.footnotes: [1] Isufi, ni ubwoya bw'intama canke ubw’agakwavu.

aya.translation: Uwo wese rero, ivyiza vyiwe bizoremera ku munzani;
Uyo, ni we azoba mu buzima bushimishije mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Nayo uwo ivyiza vyiwe bizohwahuka ku munzani;
Uyo rero, uburuhukiro bwiwe ni mu manga ihonya.
Mbega none, ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co imanga ihonya?
Ni umuriro udahera, ururumba.
Mwasamajwe n'ukwihaya ku bwinshi bw’amatungo n’ibibondo, muraheza mureka kugamburukira Imana Allah!
Mugashishikara gusamazwa n’ivyo, gushika n’aho mushengereye mugahambwa mu mva.
Nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Ivyo ntibikwiye kubasamaza namba! Nimwikebuke, ubu vuba bwango muzomenya ko ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa ari bwo bwiza kuri mwebwe.
Eka nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Nimwikebuke, ubu vuba bwango muzomenya inkurikizi mbi z’ukutumvira Imana Allah.
Eka nimuteshwe mute! Iyo mumenya vy’ukuri ibibafitiye akamaro, mworetse kwihaya ku vy’isi, mukihutira nyabuna gukora ivyiza.
Ni ukuri muzobona umuriro ururumba.
Kandi ni ukuri, muzowubona ukuri kwamye.
Hanyuma, ni ukuri kuri uwo musi w’impera, muzobazwa ku nema z’ubwoko bwose ico mwazikoresheje.
Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku gihe, kubera ibitangaza birimwo vyerekana ubushobozi bwanje!
Ko mu vy’ukuri, zina kiremwa-muntu kiri mu ruhombo;
Kiretse abemeye Imana Allah bagakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, bagahanurana no kwama bashigikiye bagendera ukuri, bakanahanurana kwihangana muri ivyo vyose.
Uguhanwa nya guhanwa, ni ukw’uwo wese anegura akandagaza abantu, akwiragiza insaku (gateranya);
Yishinga kwegeranya amatungo no kuyaharura kenshi.
Mbega yibaza ko amatungo yiwe azomubeshaho ibihe bidahera akanamukingira iharurirwa!
Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ni ukuri uyo muntu, azojugunywa muri ruyonza.
Ntumwa y'Imana! Mbega, ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co ruyonza?
Ni umuriro w’Imana Allah wama wegenyejwe;
Unyengetera mu mishaha.
Mu vy’ukuri, uwo muriro urabakikuje mu mpande zose;
Bazoba baboheshejwe iminyororo miremire n’amapingu; ntibazocaruka na gato.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, ntiwamenye ingene Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yagize beninzovu[1]!
aya.footnotes: [1] Abraha Al-Habashiy, umutware wo muri Etiyopiya n’ingabo ziwe, igihe bashaka gusenyura Al-Ka’ba.

aya.translation: Umugambi wabo mubi, ntiyawugize impfagusa ukaburizwamwo!
Iraheza Ibarungikira inyoni ziri mu migwimigwi;
Zibatera amabuye yokeje, ziraheza zirabahonya.
Maze Ibagira nk’ivyatsi vyarishijwe n'intungwa hanyuma iravyuza, iraheza ibita ari amahenehene.
Kubera akamenyero k’Abakorayishi;
Akamenyero kabo ko kuja mu gihugu ca Yemeni kiri mu bumanuko mu rushana, no kuja mu bihugu vyo muri Shaamu biri mu buraruko mu ci, aho baja kurangura ibidandazwa, bakishira bakizana ata nkomanzi.
Kubera ivyo rero, nibashimire Imana Rurema Nyene iyi ngoro ntagatifu (Al-Ka’ba), babaye hambavu yayo batekaniwe; baheze bayiyegereze mu vyo bakora vyose banayisenge ari Imwe Rudende;
Yo Yabafunguriye Ikabakiza inzara, Ikabaha n’umutekano, Ikanabakiza ubwoba.
Mbega warabonye uwuhakana yivuye inyuma, izuka ry’ibiremwa n’impera yavyo ku musi w’izuka?
Uyo, ni uwuryagumba agahahaza impfuvyi, agahonyanga agateka kayo ku karenganyo;
Ntanahimirize gufungurira abakene, nkeswe kubafungurira we nyene.
Burya guhanwa nya guhanwa, ni ukw’abasenga mu buryarya;
Abirengagiza amasengesho yabo mu kutayasengera ku mwanya wayo no mu kutubahiriza ibisabwa vyayo;
Abiyerekana mu vyo bakora kugira bashimwe n’abantu;
Bakanimana mu kudatizanya utumaramuziro[1].
aya.footnotes: [1] Bananiwe kuba abagwaneza mu gusenga Imana Allah, bananirwa no kuba abagwaneza ku biremwa.

aya.translation: Muvugishwamana! Mu vy’ukuri, Twarakweguriye impano y’ivyiza vyinshi nta ngere kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa[1].
aya.footnotes: [1] Muri ivyo vyiza, ni uruzi “Kawthar” ruri mu Bwami bw’ijuru, ku nkengera zarwo hari amahema yubatswe mu butare bw’agaciro “lulu”, umusenyi wo muri rwo, ni “miski”.

aya.translation: Kubera ivyo rero, senga wamizeko wongere ukerere kw’izina ry’Imana no ku bw’Imana yawe Rurema Allah.
Mu vy’ukuri, uwugucokora akanka n’uburongozi warungikanwe, ni we yacitswe n’ivyiza vyose, kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Emwe bagarariji!
Jewe sinzosenga ivyo musenga (ibigirwamana).
Na mwe ntimusenga Imana Imwe Rudende nsenga.
Eka nanje sinsenga uko mwebwe musenga.
Kandi na mwe ntimuzosenga Imana Imwe Rudende Allah[1] nsenga.
aya.footnotes: [1] Iyi Aayah, yahishuwe ku nkuru ya bamwe mu bagarariji bazwi ku mazina, Imana Allah Yari Izi ko batazopfa bemeye Imana Imwe Rudende Allah.

aya.translation: Mufise idini ryanyu rero, nanje nkagira idini ryanje ntarota mpindura”.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Igihe habonetse intsinzi y’Imana Allah ugatsinda ababangikanyamana mu Bakorayishi, ugaheza ugahabuza igisagara ca Makka;
Ukabona n’abantu binjira mw’idini ry’Imana Allah ry’ubwislamu ari benshi mu migwimigwi;
Aho rero, uraca witegurira kurengutswa n’Imana Allah, uheze uninahaze ushimagize Imana yawe Rurema Allah, wongere uyisabe kenshi ikigongwe. Mu vy’ukuri, Yo Yamye Yumvira cane abigaya.
Yarahonye Abu Lahabi, aragahona ku kubera ukubangamira kwiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).
Amatungo yiwe, eka n’abana biwe, nta co bizomumarira ngo bimukingire ibihano vy’Imana Allah.
Azokwinjira mu muriro ururumba cane, maze awote;
Ari kumwe n’umugore wiwe (Ummu Jamiila), yahora yikorera amahwa akayatega mu nzira Intumwa y’Imana (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) icamwo;
Uyo mukenyezi, azotabwa mu muriro aboheshejwe mw’izosi ikiziriko gitsivye neza.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Imana Allah, ni Imwe Rudende mu bumana bwayo, mu bushobozi bwo kurema no mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo.
Imana Allah, ni Yo Nyenugutumberwa muri vyose.
Ntiyavyaye kandi ntiyavyawe, eka ntigira n’umugore.
Kandi ntigira ikiremwa na kimwe bisa canke bisusa, haba mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo, haba no mu bushobozi bwayo”.
Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Ndikinze ku Mana Allah, Umuremyi w’igitondo;
Inkingire inabi y’ivyo Yaremye vyose;
N’inabi y’ijoro iyo ryijimye;
N’inabi y’abarozikazi bahuha mu mapfundo mu kuroga;
N’inabi y’umunyeshari[1] iyo asharitse”.
aya.footnotes: [1] Umunyeshari, ni umuntu asharika abandi abahora impano bahawe n’Imana Allah, akipfuza ko nya mpano zohona, akanababangamira mu buzima.

aya.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Ndikinze ku Mubungabunzi w’abantu bose;
Umwami Mugabe w’abantu, Yikenuye;
Imana Nyene gusengwa n’abantu, ata yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa atari Yo;
Inkingire inabi ya shetani itera amazinda kenshi iyo umuntu agoswe, ikanyegera iyo aninahaje Imana Allah;
Itera amazinda n’amakenga mu mitima y’abantu, ikabosha gukora ibibi no kureka ibitegetswe;
Ikomoka mu bwoko bw’Amajini n’ubw’abantu”.
